atk-s0305a0:4_1: Mahāvaggassa paṭhame pubbaṅgamāti sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena cāti dvīhākārehi pubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0305a0:4_4: Anvadeva ahirikaṃ anottappanti sā panesā yadetaṃ alajjanākārasaṇṭhikaṃ ahirikaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:4_12: Iti imāni aṭṭhapi akusaladhammasamāpattiyā micchattaaṅgāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:4_13: Tāni pana na ekakkhaṇe sabbāni labbhanti,
atk-s0305a0:5_1: Yadā hi diṭṭhisampayuttacittaṃ kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:5_2: tadā micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchākammantoti cha aṅgāni honti.
atk-s0305a0:5_6: tadā micchākammantaṭṭhāne micchāvācāya saddhiṃ tāneva cha vā pañca vā.
atk-s0305a0:5_7: Ayaṃ ājīvo nāma kuppamāno kāyavacīdvāresuyeva aññatarasmiṃ kuppati,
atk-s0305a0:5_9: Tasmā yadā ājīvasīsena tāneva cittāni kāyavacīviññattiyo samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0305a0:5_11: tathā vacīkammanti micchājīvassa vasena tāneva cha vā pañca vā.
atk-s0305a0:5_12: Yadā pana viññattiṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvā tāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:5_14: micchāsaṅkappādivasena cattāri vā hontīti evaṃ na ekakkhaṇe sabbāni labbhanti,
atk-s0305a0:6_1: Ihāpi sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena cāti dvīhākārehi pubbaṅgamatā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a0:6_12: tāni lokiyamaggakkhaṇe na ekato sabbāni labbhanti,
atk-s0305a0:7_0: Tattha yo evaṃ vadeyya “yasmā majjhimanikāyamhi mahāsaḷāyatanikasutte ‘yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi,
atk-s0305a0:7_10: Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo ca suparisuddho’ti vuttaṃ tasmā pañcaṅgikopi lokuttaramaggo hotī”ti so vattabbo –
atk-s0305a0:7_11: tasmiṃyeva sutte “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti idaṃ kasmā na passasi?
atk-s0305a0:7_14: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya hi parisuddhāni kāyakammādīni lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe atiparisuddhāni hontīti ayamattho dīpito.
atk-s0305a0:8_0: Yampi abhidhamme vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti,
atk-s0305a0:8_2: Yasmiñhi kāle micchākammantaṃ pahāya sammākammantaṃ pūreti,
atk-s0305a0:8_3: tasmiṃ kāle micchāvācā vā micchājīvo vā na hoti,
atk-s0305a0:8_4: diṭṭhi saṅkappo vāyāmo sati samādhīti imesuyeva pañcasu kārakaṅgesu sammākammanto pūrati.
atk-s0305a0:8_7: Iti imaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:8_12: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:8_13: ayaṃ bhikkhave sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaramaggo”ti.
atk-s0305a0:8_14: Evaṃ pana mahācattālīsakasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu sammākammantādīnañca lokuttaramaggassa aṅgabhāvasiddhito
atk-s0305a0:8_16: Imasmiṃ sutte ayaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo lokiyalokuttaramissakova kathito.
atk-s0305a0:10_1: Tatiye sakalamidaṃ bhanteti ānandatthero sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ appattatāya sakalampi maggabrahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0305a0:10_3: dhammasenāpati pana sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthake ṭhitattā aññāsi,
atk-s0305a0:12_1: Catutthe sabbasetena vaḷavābhirathenāti sakalasetena catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathena.
atk-s0305a0:12_2: So kira sabbo sacakkapañjarakubbaro rajataparikkhitto hoti.
atk-s0305a0:12_6: Tattha yodharatho caturassasaṇṭhāno hoti nātimahā dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā janānaṃ gahaṇasamattho.
atk-s0305a0:12_7: Alaṅkāraratho mahā hoti dīghato dīgho puthulato puthulo ca,
atk-s0305a0:12_8: tattha chattaggāhako vālabījaniggāhako tālavaṇṭaggāhakoti evaṃ aṭṭha vā dasa vā sukheneva ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā sakkonti.
atk-s0305a0:13_0: Setā sudaṃ assāti tā vaḷavā pakatiyā setavaṇṇāva.
atk-s0305a0:13_2: Seto rathoti rathopi vuttanayeneva rajataparikkhittattā tattha tattha dantakammakhacitattā ca setova.
atk-s0305a0:13_3: Setaparivāroti yathā aññe rathā sīhacammaparivārāpi honti,
atk-s0305a0:14_0: Setaṃ chattanti rathamajjhe ussāpitachattampi setameva ahosi.
atk-s0305a0:14_1: Setaṃ uṇhīsanti aṭṭhaṅgulavitthāro rajatamayo uṇhīsapaṭṭo seto.
atk-s0305a0:14_5: Setā upāhanāti upāhanā nāma maggāruḷhassa vā honti aṭaviṃ vā pavisantassa.
atk-s0305a0:14_7: tenassa tadanucchaviko rajatapaṭisevito pādālaṅkāro nāma esa evaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:14_12: dasasu aṅgulīsu aṅgulimuddikā kaṇṇesu kuṇḍalānīti evamādi alaṅkāropissa rajatamayova ahosi.
atk-s0305a0:15_2: so kira channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti –
atk-s0305a0:15_3: “ito ettakehi divasehi nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karissatī”ti puretarameva ghosanā kayirati.
atk-s0305a0:15_4: Taṃ sutvā ye nagarato na pakkantā,
atk-s0305a0:15_9: tadā pātova nagaravīthiyo sammajjitvā vālikaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamehi pupphehi vippakiritvā puṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0305a0:15_10: ṭhapetvā kadaliyo ca dhaje ca ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhūpitavāsitaṃ karonti.
atk-s0305a0:16_0: Brāhmaṇo pātova sīsaṃ nhāyitvā purebhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vuttanayeneva setavatthādīhi attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā pāsādā oruyha rathaṃ abhiruhati.
atk-s0305a0:16_1: Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā sabbasetavatthavilepanamālālaṅkārā setacchattāni gahetvā parivārenti.
atk-s0305a0:16_2: Tato mahājanassa sannipātatthaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva taruṇadārakānaṃ phalāphalāni vikiranti,
atk-s0305a0:16_7: Atha brāhmaṇo maṅgalikasovatthikādīsu maṅgalāni ceva suvatthiyo ca karontesu mahāsampattiyā nagaraṃ anuvicarati.
atk-s0305a0:16_8: Puññavantā manussā ekabhūmikādipāsāde āruyha sukapattasadisāni vātapānakavāṭāni vivaritvā olokenti.
atk-s0305a0:16_9: Brāhmaṇopi attano yasasirisampattiyā nagaraṃ ajjhottharanto viya dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho hoti.
atk-s0305a0:17_0: Tamenaṃ jano disvāti mahājano taṃ rathaṃ disvā.
atk-s0305a0:17_2: Brahmaṃ vata bho yānanti seṭṭhayānasadisaṃ vata bho yānanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a0:17_4: manussā nāma vaṇṇabhāṇakānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attano dārikānaṃ vaṇṇagītaṃ gāyāpenti “abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo mahaddhano mahābhogo”ti,
atk-s0305a0:17_5: na ca tena vaṇṇabhaṇanamattena abhirūpā vā honti mahaddhanā vā,
atk-s0305a0:17_7: “brahmaṃ vata bho yāna”nti kiñcāpi evaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-s0305a0:17_8: na panetaṃ yānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanamatteneva brahmayānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:17_10: Paramatthena pana imasseva kho etaṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0305a0:17_13: iminā ca ariyā nibbānaṃ yantīti brahmayānaṃ itipi,
atk-s0305a0:17_15: anuttarattā kilesasaṅgāmassa ca vijitattā anuttaro saṅgāmavijayo itipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a0:18_1: Tattha rāgaṃ vinayamānā pariyosāpeti pariyosānaṃ gacchati nipphajjatīti rāgavinayapariyosānā.
atk-s0305a0:19_0: Yassa saddhā ca paññā cāti yassa ariyamaggayānassa saddhānusārivasena saddhā,
atk-s0305a0:19_1: dhammānusārivasena paññāti ime dve dhammā sadā dhuraṃ yuttā,
atk-s0305a0:19_3: Hirī īsāti attanā saddhiṃ adhiviṭṭhena bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānena ottappena saddhiṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī yassa maggarathassa īsā.
atk-s0305a0:19_5: Yathā hi rathassa vākādimayaṃ yottaṃ goṇe ekābaddhe karoti ekasaṅgahite,
atk-s0305a0:19_7: lokuttaravipassanācittaṃ atirekasaṭṭhi kusaladhamme ekābaddhe ekasaṅgahe karoti.
atk-s0305a0:19_10: Yathā hi rathassa ārakkho sārathi nāma yoggiyo.
atk-s0305a0:19_11: Dhuraṃ vāheti yojeti akkhaṃ abbhañjati rathaṃ peseti rathayuttake nibbisevane karoti,
atk-s0305a0:19_13: Ayañhi ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā ceva kusalākusalānañca dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesatīti vuttā.
atk-s0305a0:20_2: Jhānakkhoti vipassanāsampayuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vasena jhānamayaakkho.
atk-s0305a0:20_4: kāyikacetasikasaṅkhātāni dve vīriyāni assa cakkānīti attho.
atk-s0305a0:20_6: unnatonatākārassa abhāvena dvinnampi yugapadesānaṃ samatāti attho.
atk-s0305a0:20_7: Ayañhi tatramajjhattupekkhā cittuppādassa līnuddhaccabhāvaṃ haritvā payogamajjhatte cittaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-s0305a0:20_9: Anicchā parivāraṇanti bāhirakarathassa sīhacammādīni viya imassāpi ariyamaggarathassa alobhasaṅkhātā anicchā parivāraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a0:21_3: Yassa āvudhanti yassa ariyamaggarathe ṭhitassa kulaputtassa etaṃ pañcavidhaṃ āvudhaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:21_4: Yathā hi rathe ṭhito pañcahi āvudhehi sapatte vijjhati,
atk-s0305a0:21_5: evaṃ yogāvacaropi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramaggarathe ṭhito mettāya dosaṃ vijjhati,
atk-s0305a0:21_13: Yathā hi rathe ṭhito rathiko paṭimukkacammo āgatāgate sare khamati,
atk-s0305a0:21_15: evaṃ adhivāsanakkhantisamannāgato bhikkhu āgatāgate vacanapathe khamati,
atk-s0305a0:21_18: Yogakkhemāya vattatīti catūhi yogehi khemāya nibbānāya vattati,
atk-s0305a0:22_0: Etadattani sambhūtanti etaṃ maggayānaṃ attano purisakāraṃ nissāya laddhattā attani sambhūtaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:22_2: Niyyanti dhīrā lokamhāti yesaṃ etaṃ yānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0305a0:22_3: te dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā lokamhā niyyanti gacchanti.
atk-s0305a0:22_5: Jayaṃ jayanti rāgādayo sapatte jinantā jinantā.
atk-s0305a0:24_3: Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhañceva missakamaggo ca kathito.
atk-s0305a0:26_1: Sattame nibbānadhātuyā kho etaṃ bhikkhu adhivacananti asaṅkhatāya amatāya nibbānadhātuyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:26_2: Āsavānaṃ khayo tena vuccatīti apica tena rāgādivinayena āsavānaṃ khayotipi vuccati.
atk-s0305a0:26_5: Etadavocāti “satthārā nibbānadhātūti vadantena amataṃ nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:26_7: Taṃ kathāpessāmī”ti anusandhikusalatāya pucchanto etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0305a0:28_1: Aṭṭhame katamā ca bhikkhave sammādiṭṭhīti ekena pariyāyena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ vibhajitvā puna aparena pariyāyena vibhajitukāmo idaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a0:28_2: Tattha dukkhe ñāṇanti savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇavasena catūhākārehi uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:28_4: Sesesu pana dvīsu sammasanassa abhāvā tividhameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a0:29_6: “katame pañcakkhandhā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā nayena vitthārena ca ācariyasantike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento yogāvacaro kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a0:29_9: maggasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti evaṃ savaneneva kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a0:29_10: So evaṃ karonto cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0305a0:31_7: Itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ dassanatthāya payogo bhavaggaggahaṇatthaṃ hatthapasāraṇaṃ viya avīciphusanatthaṃ pādapasāraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a0:31_8: viya satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanaṃ viya ca hoti.
atk-s0305a0:31_10: Evaṃ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena idaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:31_11: Paṭivedhakkhaṇe pana ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:32_5: Sabbepi ca te nekkhammasaṅkappādayo kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāviramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā,
atk-s0305a0:32_6: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a0:33_0: Musāvādā veramaṇīādayopi musāvādādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā,
atk-s0305a0:33_1: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu catūsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a0:34_0: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī ādayopi pāṇātipātādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā,
atk-s0305a0:34_1: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya akiriyato padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a0:35_4: Sammājīvopi kuhanādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā.
atk-s0305a0:35_5: Maggakkhaṇe pana imesuyeva sattasu ṭhānesu uppannāya micchājīvadussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a0:36_0: Anuppannānanti ekasmiṃ bhave tathārūpe vā ārammaṇe attano na uppannānaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:36_2: “aho vata me evarūpā pāpakā dhammā na uppajjeyyu”nti evaṃ anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya.
atk-s0305a0:36_3: Chandanti tesaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādakapaṭipattisādhakaṃ vīriyacchandaṃ janeti.
atk-s0305a0:36_6: Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti vīriyena cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a0:36_7: Padahatīti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”ti padhānaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0305a0:36_9: Idāni tādise na uppādessāmīti tesaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti.
atk-s0305a0:37_7: Ayampi sammāvāyāmo anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanādicittanānattā pubbabhāge nānā.
atk-s0305a0:37_8: Maggakkhaṇe pana imesuyeva catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ekameva kusalavīriyaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:38_1: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekā sati uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:39_4: dutiyamaggādayopi paṭhamajjhānikā vā dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhānikā vā.
atk-s0305a0:39_6: dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā vā.
atk-s0305a0:39_7: Evaṃ cattāropi maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti.
atk-s0305a0:40_1: Pādakajjhānaniyamena hi paṭhamajjhānalābhino paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppannamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti,
atk-s0305a0:40_3: Dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno dutiyajjhāniko hoti,
atk-s0305a0:40_8: Esa nayo catutthajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā.
atk-s0305a0:41_4: Etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato vuṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā arūpasamāpattiṃ bhāvetvā so āruppe uppanno,
atk-s0305a0:41_11: Tesaṃ vādavinicchayo visuddhimagge vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanādhikāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:43_1: Navame micchāpaṇihitanti sūkaṃ nāma uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindati,
atk-s0305a0:43_8: diṭṭhiyāti kammassakatapaññāya ceva maggabhāvanāya ca micchā ṭhapitattā,
atk-s0305a0:43_10: Imasmiṃ sutte kammassakatañāṇaṃ magganissitaṃ katvā missakamaggo kathito.
atk-s0305a0:49_5: ekaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyituṃ nilīyituṃ ekova hutvā viharituṃ icchāmīti attho.
atk-s0305a0:49_6: Namhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenāti yo attanā payuttavācaṃ akatvā mamatthāya
atk-s0305a0:49_7: saddhesu kulesu paṭiyattaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ nīharitvā mayhaṃ upanāmeyya,
atk-s0305a0:49_8: taṃ piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā namhi aññena kenaci bhikkhunā vā gahaṭṭhena vā upasaṅkamitabboti.
atk-s0305a0:50_1: Tasmiṃ kira aḍḍhamāse vinetabbo satto nāhosi.
atk-s0305a0:50_5: anāgate ca pacchimā janatā ‘satthāpi gaṇaṃ vihāya ekako vihāsi,
atk-s0305a0:50_7: tadassā bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti iminā kāraṇena evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:50_8: Bhikkhusaṅghopi satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ adāsi.
atk-s0305a0:50_9: So pātova gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanamukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānādīni sabbakiccāni tasmiṃ khaṇe katvā apagacchati.
atk-s0305a0:51_3: Tassa padesena vihāsinti tassa paṭhamābhisambuddhavihārassa padesena.

atk-s0305a0:51_7: Bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekūnapaññāsadivasabbhantare yathā nāma pattarajjo rājā attano vibhavasāradassanatthaṃ
atk-s0305a0:51_8: taṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ vivarāpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamuttāmaṇiādīni ratanāni paccavekkhanto vihareyya,

atk-s0305a0:51_10: Imasmiṃ pana aḍḍhamāse tesaṃ khandhānaṃ padesaṃ vedanākkhandhameva paccavekkhanto vihāsi.
atk-s0305a0:51_11: Tassa “ime sattā evarūpaṃ nāma sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti,
atk-s0305a0:51_12: evarūpaṃ dukkha”nti olokayato yāva bhavaggā pavattā sukhavedanā,
atk-s0305a0:51_15: Atha naṃ “micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita”ntiādinā nayena pariggaṇhanto vihāsi.
atk-s0305a0:52_0: Tathā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ dvādasāyatanāni nippadesāneva katvā vihāsi,
atk-s0305a0:52_1: imasmiṃ pana aḍḍhamāse tesaṃ āyatanānaṃ padesaṃ vedanāvasena dhammāyatanekadesaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:52_4: paccayānaṃ padesaṃ phassapaccayā vedanāvasena paccayekadesaṃ jhānānaṃ padesaṃ vedanāvaseneva jhānaṅgekadesaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:52_5: nāmarūpānaṃ padesaṃ vedanāvaseneva nāmekadesaṃ paccavekkhanto vihāsi.
atk-s0305a0:52_6: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi ekūnapaññāsadivasabbhantare kusalādidhamme nippadese katvā anantanayāni satta pakaraṇāni paccavekkhanto vihāsi.
atk-s0305a0:52_7: Imasmiṃ pana aḍḍhamāse sabbadhammānaṃ padesaṃ vedanāttikameva paccavekkhanto vihāsi.
atk-s0305a0:52_8: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sā sā ca vihārasamāpatti vedanānubhāvena jātā.

atk-s0305a0:93_7: nimujjitvā sambhajjamukhadvāraṃ patvā pañca mahānadiyo pavisitvā himavantaṃ gacchanti.

atk-s0305a0:94_2: tadā “idāni no dārakā ūmivegañca garuḷavegañca sahituṃ sakkhissantī”ti ñatvā attano ānubhāvena mahāmeghaṃ
atk-s0305a0:94_3: samuṭṭhāpetvā sakalahimavantaṃ ekodakaṃ viya kurumānā devaṃ vassāpetvā suvaṇṇarajatādimayā nāvā māpetvā

atk-s0305a0:144_0: Anussatinti rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu nisinnassa “idāni ariyā leṇaguhamaṇḍapādīsu jhānavipassanāmaggaphalasukhehi vītināmentī”ti anussaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:144_1: Yo vā tesaṃ santike ovādo laddho hoti,

atk-s0305a0:144_9: Ariyesu pasādena aññattha pabbajitvā ariyānaṃ santike ovādānusāsaniṃ paccāsīsamānassa carato pabbajjāpi anupabbajjā nāma.
atk-s0305a0:144_10: Aññesu pana pasādena aññesaṃyeva santike pabbajitvā aññesaṃyeva ovādānusāsaniṃ paccāsīsamānassa carato pabbajjā anupabbajjā nāma na hoti.

atk-s0305a0:146_5: Atha vā pavicinatīti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vicinati.
atk-s0305a0:147_0: Satta phalā sattānisaṃsāti ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:147_1: Diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṃ ārādhetīti arahattaṃ ārādhento imasmiṃyeva attabhāve ārādheti,
atk-s0305a0:148_2: Kappasahassāyukesu tāva avihesu nibbattitvā eko nibbattadivaseyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a0:148_6: Aparo evaṃ asakkonto dvinnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:148_8: Aparo evampi asakkonto catunnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:149_0: Pañcamaṃ pana kappasataṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patto upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:149_2: Yattha katthaci uppanno pana sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ patto sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma,
atk-s0305a0:149_4: Avihādīsupi nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ patto uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-s0305a0:150_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne aṭṭhacattārīsa anāgāmino kathetabbā.
atk-s0305a0:150_9: cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti aṭṭhāti evaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsa honti.
atk-s0305a0:150_10: Tesaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī sabbajeṭṭho ceva hoti sabbakaniṭṭho ca. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0305a0:150_11: So hi soḷasakappasahassāyukattā āyunā sabbesaṃ jeṭṭho,
atk-s0305a0:150_13: Imasmiṃ sutte apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikā nānālakkhaṇā arahattamaggassa pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā.
atk-s0305a0:152_1: Catutthe satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me hotīti satisambojjhaṅgoti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:152_2: Appamāṇoti me hotīti appamāṇoti evaṃ me hoti.
atk-s0305a0:152_5: uppādaṃ anāvajjitattā anuppādaṃ āvajjitattā satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati, pavattaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:153_0: Iti imasmiṃ sutte therassa phalabojjhaṅgā kathitā.
atk-s0305a0:153_1: Yadā hi thero satisambojjhaṅgaṃ sīsaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0305a0:153_4: tadāpi sesā tadanvayā hontīti evaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ attano ciṇṇavasitaṃ dassento thero imaṃ suttaṃ kathesīti.
atk-s0305a0:157_1: Chaṭṭhe ārāmanissayīti ārāmaṃ nissāya vasanabhāvena ārāmanissayī.
atk-s0305a0:157_5: yo pana parappavādaṃ madditvā attano vādaṃ dīpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:157_10: Aññena vā ārāmena pavisitvā aññaṃ ārāmaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:157_11: aññena uyyānena aññaṃ uyyānanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a0:157_15: evaṃ nibbeṭhana”nti iminā nayena itivādo hoti itivādappamokkhoti etaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:158_3: idāni pucchituṃ na sakkotī”ti ñatvā “na tāva ayaṃ desanā yathānusandhiṃ gatā.
atk-s0305a0:158_4: Idāni naṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpessāmī”ti sayameva pucchanto imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a0:158_8: ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattanti tassa nāmakāyo ca cittañca gocarajjhatte ṭhitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:158_12: Na maṅku hotīti tasmiṃ na maṅku hoti.
atk-s0305a0:159_2: indriyasaṃvaro evaṃ bahulīkato tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti ettha evaṃ sucaritapūraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0305a0:159_3: imesu tāva chasu dvāresu aṭṭhārasa duccaritāni honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0305a0:159_4: Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe lobhaṃ uppādentassa manoduccaritaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:159_5: Lobhasahagatena cittena “aho vatidaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti bhaṇantassa vacīduccaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:160_1: sotadvārasmiñhi saddārammaṇassa vatthubhūtaṃ saṅkhapaṇavāditūriyabhaṇḍaṃ anāmāsaṃ āmasantassa,
atk-s0305a0:160_5: manodvāre paññattivasena dhammārammaṇabhūtaṃ sappitelamadhuphāṇitādiṃ āmasantassa kāyaduccaritaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:160_6: Saṅkhepato panettha chasu dvāresu kāyavītikkamo kāyaduccaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:161_0: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu attano bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāne ṭhito imāni duccaritāni sucaritaṃ katvā vipariṇāmeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0305a0:161_1: Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acāletvā rūpārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhāpayato manosucaritaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:161_2: vipassanāsahagatena cittena khayadhammaṃ vayadhammanti bhaṇantassa vacīsucaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:161_5: Evaṃ imāni vitthārato aṭṭhārasa sucaritāni honti.
atk-s0305a0:161_6: Saṅkhepato panetthāpi chasu dvāresu kāyasaṃvaro kāyasucaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:161_9: Evaṃ indriyasaṃvaro tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:162_5: manosaṃvarena tīṇi sīlānīti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:162_6: Sakale pana imasmiṃ sutte sucaritamūlakā satipaṭṭhānā lokuttaramissakā,
atk-s0305a0:166_1: Navame nāññatra tathāgatassa pātubhāvāti tathāgatassa pātubhāvaṃ vinā na aññasmiṃ kāle uppajjantīti attho.
atk-s0305a0:168_0: 191. Dasame nāññatra sugatavinayāti sugatovādaṃ vinā na uppajjantīti.
atk-s0305a0:172_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame cattāro iriyāpathe kappentīti yesaṃ cattāro iriyāpathā atthi,
atk-s0305a0:174_1: Catutthe tathā pahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosīti therassa kira imaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0305a0:174_2: sādhukaṃ suṇantassa etadahosi “mayhaṃ pabbajitadivasato sattame divase saccāni paṭivijjhantassa ime bojjhaṅgā
atk-s0305a0:174_4: Athassa “niyyānikaṃ vata satthusāsana”nti cintayato lohitaṃ pasīdi,
atk-s0305a0:174_6: pokkharapatte patitaudakabindu viya sarīrato rogo vinivattitvā gato.
atk-s0305a0:174_7: Tena vuttaṃ “tathā pahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:174_9: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi janānaṃ pabbatapāde pupphitavisarukkhavātasamphassena uppanno mandasītajaro ābādhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:178_1: Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame kittāvatā nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0305a0:178_3: kittakena nu kho bujjhanakaaṅgā nāma vuccantīti pucchati.
atk-s0305a0:182_1: Chaṭṭhe etadavocāti “imissaṃ parisati nisinno udāyitthero nāma anusandhikusalo bhikkhu atthi,
atk-s0305a0:182_2: so maṃ pucchissatīti bhagavatā osāpitadesanaṃ ñatvā desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭessāmī”ti pucchanto etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0305a0:182_4: Subhāvito hi satisambojjhaṅgo vipulo ca mahaggato ca appamāṇo ca abyāpajjo ca nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:182_8: nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvena byāpādarahitattā abyāpajjho nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:182_9: Taṇhāya pahānā kammaṃ pahīyatīti yaṃ taṇhāmūlakaṃ kammaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-s0305a0:182_11: Kammassa pahānā dukkhanti yampi kammamūlakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-s0305a0:184_6: te vā bhāvetvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva.
atk-s0305a0:184_7: Tampi pana magganissitaṃ katvā missakameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a0:186_0: 210. Navame saṃyojanavinibandhāti saṃyojanasaṅkhātā vinibandhā. Ajjhosānāti pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇā.
atk-s0305a0:188_3: avakujjaṃ vayoti udayabbayavasena parivattento sammasantoti dīpeti.
atk-s0305a0:188_7: Sace hi thero tasmiṃ samaye sotāpanno,
atk-s0305a0:188_11: Tathā tathā viharantanti tena tenākārena viharantaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:188_13: Khīṇā jātītiādīhi tathattāyāti adhippetaṃ tathābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0305a0:192_1: Catutthavaggassa tatiye na ca pabhassaranti na ca pabhāvantaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:192_4: Ṭhapetvā idha vuttāni cattāri avasesaṃ lohaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a0:192_11: tadaggeneva te lokiyassāpi lokuttarassāpi upakkilesā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:192_13: Anāvaraṇā anīvaraṇāti kusaladhamme na āvarantīti anāvaraṇā,
atk-s0305a0:194_2: Nīvaraṇānañhi abhiṇhuppāde sati antarantarā uppajjamānā paññā dubbalā hoti mandā avisadā.
atk-s0305a0:195_0: Pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti.
atk-s0305a0:195_1: Sattabojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti ariyasāvakassa hi sappāyadhammassavanaṃ suṇantassa pañca nīvaraṇā dūre honti.
atk-s0305a0:195_2: So sace tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:195_5: tato vuṭṭhāya rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ gato tameva pītiṃ avijahanto pañca nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā visesaṃ nibbattessati.
atk-s0305a0:195_6: Tattha asakkontopi yāva sattadivasabbhantarā tameva pītiṃ avijahanto nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā visesaṃ nibbattessatīti idaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:195_7: Dhammassavanavasena sakiṃ pītipāmojjapakkhiyā paṭiladdhabojjhaṅgā hi kammārāmatādīni āgamma nassanti,
atk-s0305a0:195_8: tathārūpaṃ pana utusappāyādiṃ labhitvā puna uppajjantāpi tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti icceva vuccati.
atk-s0305a0:203_1: Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame tisso vidhāti tayo mānakoṭṭhāsā,
atk-s0305a0:203_3: Tathā tathā vidahanato hi mānova vidhāti vuccati.
atk-s0305a0:205_4: catūhi vā saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ rañjetīti rājā,
atk-s0305a0:205_6: “Pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti puññānubhāvena abbhuggatāya vācāya codento cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī,
atk-s0305a0:208_0: Cakkaratanassa ca nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0305a0:208_1: sabbeva gandhapupphādīhi tasseva pūjañca abhivādanādīni ca karontīti cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:208_2: Cakkaratanassa ca “ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ agghatī”ti aggho natthi,
atk-s0305a0:208_4: Cakkaratanañca aññehi loke vijjamānaratanehi asadisanti atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:208_5: Yasmā pana yasmiṃ kappe buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:211_2: cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvoti ayuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:211_3: Uppannañhi cakkaṃ vattetvā so cakkavattī nāma hotīti nāyuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0305a0:211_6: so paṭisandhito pabhuti “cakkavatti pātubhūto”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0305a0:211_8: Yo hi esa cakkavattīti laddhanāmo sattaviseso,
atk-s0305a0:211_11: Pātubhūtehi pana tehi saddhiṃ paripakke puññasambhāre so saṃyujjati,
atk-s0305a0:211_14: Yadā hi lokassa tesu pātubhāvasaññā uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:211_16: pacchā itarāni cha pātubhavantīti bahulavacanato cāpi etaṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:211_21: Yasmā yo so puññasambhāro rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ paṭisandhivasena pātubhāvayati,
atk-s0305a0:211_24: imāni pana satta ratanānipi pātubhavantīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a0:211_25: Yatheva hi so puññasambhāro rañño janakahetu,
atk-s0305a0:211_28: cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:212_0: Idāni tesaṃ ratanānaṃ sarūpavasena dassanatthaṃ katamesaṃ sattannaṃ cakkaratanassātiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:212_2: dvisahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhavaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ samatthassa cakkaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0305a0:212_3: tathā purebhattameva sāgarapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anupariyāyanasamatthassa vehāsaṅgamassa hatthiratanassa,
atk-s0305a0:212_5: caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre yojanappamāṇaṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanasamatthassa maṇiratanassa,
atk-s0305a0:212_7: yojanappamāṇe padese antopathavigatānaṃ nidhīnaṃ dassanasamatthassa gahapatiratanassa,
atk-s0305a0:212_8: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā sakalarajjānusāsanasamatthassa jeṭṭhaputtasaṅkhātassa pariṇāyakaratanassa ca pātubhāvo hotīti.
atk-s0305a0:212_10: Vitthārato pana tesaṃ cakkaratanādīnaṃ pātubhāvavidhānaṃ mahāsudassanādīsu suttesu āgatameva.
atk-s0305a0:213_1: yatheva hi cakkavattino cakkaratanaṃ sabbaratanānaṃ purecaraṃ,
atk-s0305a0:213_4: Cakkavattino ca ratanesu mahākāyūpapannaṃ accuggataṃ vipulaṃ mahantaṃ hatthiratanaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:213_5: idampi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ mahantaṃ dhammakāyūpapannaṃ accuggataṃ vipulaṃ mahantanti hatthiratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:213_7: idampi vīriyasambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ sīghaṃ lahu javanti imāya sīghalahujavatāya assaratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:213_10: idampi pītisambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ tāya ekantakusalattā kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamati,
atk-s0305a0:213_11: sahajātapaccayādivasena ñāṇālokaṃ dassetīti iminā andhakāravidhamanaālokadassanabhāvena maṇiratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:214_4: Cakkavattino gahapatiratanaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe dhanadānena vikkhepaṃ pacchinditvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a0:214_6: vikkhepaṃ pacchinditvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ karotīti gahapatiratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:214_7: Cakkavattino ca pariṇāyakaratanaṃ sabbatthakiccasampādanena appossukkataṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a0:214_8: Idampi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ cittuppādaṃ līnuddhaccato mocetvā payogamajjhatte ṭhapayamānaṃ appossukkataṃ karotīti pariṇāyakaratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:214_9: Iti imasmiṃ sutte catubhūmako sabbasaṅgāhikadhammaparicchedo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:216_1: Catutthe eḷamūgoti mukhena vācaṃ nicchāretuṃ sakkontopi dosehi mūgo asampannavacano.
atk-s0305a0:220_1: Chaṭṭhavaggassa paṭhame ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāyātiādīsu ayaṃ purimanayato viseso.
atk-s0305a0:220_2: Na kevalañhi satisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ete vuttappakārāva uppādāya,
atk-s0305a0:220_3: uppannānaṃ vā bhāvanāya pāripūriyā paccayā honti,
atk-s0305a0:220_5: Aparepi hi cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti satisampajaññaṃ muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0305a0:220_10: ṭhānanisajjādīsu satisamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatāya ca satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:220_11: Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a0:222_4: Yadā pana cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:222_7: Tasmā kesādichedanena uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi sarīrasallahukabhāvakaraṇena ucchādananahāpanena ca ajjhattikavatthu visadaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:222_9: Etasmiñhi ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi avisadaṃ aparisuddhaṃ
atk-s0305a0:222_10: hoti aparisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-s0305a0:222_11: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni
atk-s0305a0:223_12: atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:223_16: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a0:224_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
atk-s0305a0:224_5: Cittuppādamatteneva kusalaṃ hotīti atidhāvitvā dānādīni akaronto niraye uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:224_7: Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0305a0:224_8: Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0305a0:224_9: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati,
atk-s0305a0:224_10: vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0305a0:225_0: Api ca samādhikammikassa balavatīpi saddhā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a0:225_2: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a0:225_8: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato,
atk-s0305a0:225_11: sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā.
atk-s0305a0:225_12: Tenāha “sati ca pana sabbatthikā vuttā bhagavatā.
atk-s0305a0:225_16: na vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:226_0: Duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā nāma khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññānaṃ dummedhapuggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:226_2: Gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā nāma gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-s0305a0:226_4: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a0:228_3: pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi khuppipāsāhi āturībhūtakālepi,
atk-s0305a0:228_6: Ayameva te bhikkhu kālo”ti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:229_1: āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā ayamānisaṃso vīriyassā”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinopi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:229_5: So ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:230_3: nāpi ‘taṃ nissāya jīvissāmā’ti te paṇītāni piṇḍapātādīni denti.
atk-s0305a0:230_4: Atha kho attano kārānaṃ mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsamānā denti.
atk-s0305a0:230_5: Satthārāpi “ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhibahulo sukhaṃ viharissatī”ti na evaṃ sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0305a0:230_6: atha kho “ayaṃ ime paribhuñjamānova samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī’ti te paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0305a0:230_7: so dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apacāyissasi,
atk-s0305a0:230_8: āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma hotī”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati mahāmittattherassa viya.
atk-s0305a0:231_1: Tasseva gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0305a0:231_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma,
atk-s0305a0:231_7: tava bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-s0305a0:231_9: ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkaṃ pārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjiyena bhuttāmhī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:231_11: “Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi, ammā”ti.
atk-s0305a0:232_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi “mahāupāsikā kira kañjiyena
atk-s0305a0:232_3: taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ na vatthuṃ na bhattaṃ na vatthaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0305a0:232_5: tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0305a0:232_7: ayaṃ kho pana piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā gaṇhitu”nti pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0305a0:232_8: gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce,
atk-s0305a0:232_9: cīvaraṃ cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā “arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0305a0:232_10: Dīgharattaṃ appamatto hutvā nivutthabhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purebhattameva arahattaṃ patvā vikasamānamiva
atk-s0305a0:234_0: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0305a0:235_1: piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ arahantānaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā mahallakitthiyo dukkhā muccissantī”ti āha.
atk-s0305a0:235_2: Thero uṭṭhahitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā kālaṃ olokento “pātoyevā”ti ñatvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0305a0:236_0: Dārikāpi bhattaṃ sampādetvā “idāni me bhātā āgamissati,
atk-s0305a0:236_2: Sā there gharadvāraṃ sampatte pattaṃ gahetvā sappiphāṇitayojitassa khīrapiṇḍapātassa pūretvā hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0305a0:236_5: Therassa hi tadā ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-s0305a0:236_7: mukhaṃ bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya ativiya virocittha.
atk-s0305a0:237_3: Upāsikā “ajja me puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti ñatvā “abhiramati te, amma,
atk-s0305a0:238_3: Yathā hi vippaṭipannaṃ puttaṃ mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ amhākaṃ aputto’ti paribāhiraṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a0:238_4: so tesaṃ accayena dāyajjaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0305a0:238_5: evaṃ kusītopi idaṃ ariyadhanadāyajjaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0305a0:239_1: satthuno hi te mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakālepi abhinikkhamanepi abhisambodhiyampi dhammacakkappavattana-
atk-s0305a0:239_5: Yuttaṃ nu kho te evarūpassa satthu sāsane pabbajitvā kusītena bhavitu”nti evaṃ satthumahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:240_4: tayā nāma evarūpena jinaputtena hutvā na yuttaṃ kusītena viharitu”nti evaṃ jātimahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:241_0: “Sāriputtamoggallānā ceva asīti mahāsāvakā ca vīriyeneva lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:241_1: Tvaṃ pana etesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjasi,
atk-s0305a0:241_2: na paṭipajjasī”ti evaṃ sabrahmacārimahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:242_0: Kucchiṃ pūretvā ṭhitaajagarasadise vissaṭṭhakāyikacetasikavīriye kusītapuggale parivajjentassāpi,
atk-s0305a0:242_1: āraddhavīriye pahitatte puggale sevantassāpi ṭhānanisajjādīsu vīriyuppādanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:242_2: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a0:244_0: Buddhaguṇe anussarantassāpi hi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:244_2: dīgharattaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā rakkhitaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0305a0:244_4: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā “evaṃ nāma adamhā”ti cāgaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0305a0:244_5: gihinopi evarūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0305a0:244_8: samāpattiyā vikkhambhitā kilesā saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni na samudācarantīti paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0305a0:244_14: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a0:246_1: sītuṇhesu utūsu ṭhānādīsu ca iriyāpathesu sappāyaṃ utuñca iriyāpathañca sevantassāpi passaddhi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:246_5: tasseva visabhāge utuiriyāpathe vajjetvā sabhāge sevantassa uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:246_6: Majjhattapayogo vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-s0305a0:246_12: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a0:247_11: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyatā ca indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0305a0:248_1: Samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatāti yasmiṃ samaye atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:248_3: Samaye cittassa niggaṇhanatāti yasmiṃ samaye accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:248_5: Samaye sampahaṃsanatāti yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānaṃ vigamena vā nirassādaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:249_0: Samaye ajjhupekkhanatā nāma yasmiṃ samaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe
atk-s0305a0:249_2: tadāssa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu na byāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathi viya samappavattesu assesu.
atk-s0305a0:249_4: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā appattānaṃ vikkhittacittānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:249_5: Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma upacārena vā appanāya vā samāhitacittānaṃ sevanā bhajanā payirupāsanā.
atk-s0305a0:249_8: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a0:250_7: “tvaṃ attanova kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissasi,
atk-s0305a0:250_8: esopi attano kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissati,
atk-s0305a0:250_9: tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī”ti evaṃ kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇena ca –
atk-s0305a0:250_11: so tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī”ti evaṃ nissattapaccavekkhaṇena ca.
atk-s0305a0:250_13: “idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikāratañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca upagantvā pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0305a0:250_15: nāyaṃ evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyā”ti evaṃ assāmikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca,
atk-s0305a0:251_0: Sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatāti ettha yo puggalo gihi vā attano puttadhītādike,
atk-s0305a0:251_7: asuko daharo kuhi”nti bhantamigo viya ito cito ca āloketi,
atk-s0305a0:251_8: aññena kesacchedanādīnaṃ atthāya “muhuttaṃ tāva asukaṃ pesethā”ti yāciyamānopi “amhepi taṃ attano kammaṃ na kārema,
atk-s0305a0:251_9: tumhe naṃ gahetvā kilamessathā”ti na deti,
atk-s0305a0:251_13: tāvakālikaṃ yācitopi “mayampi imaṃ dhanāyantā na paribhuñjāma,
atk-s0305a0:251_16: Yo pana tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto udāsino,
atk-s0305a0:251_18: Iti ayaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo evarūpaṃ sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaṃ ārakā parivajjentassāpi,
atk-s0305a0:251_21: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a0:252_1: Yonisomanasikārabahulīkāroti ettha pana yonisomanasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro,
atk-s0305a0:252_4: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0305a0:253_3: catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojane mattaññunopi.
atk-s0305a0:256_0: Asubhakammikatissattherasadise asubhabhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi kāmacchando pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:256_3: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:256_4: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa kāmacchandassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:257_0: Mettā cetovimuttīti ettha mettāti vutte appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0305a0:257_3: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0305a0:258_0: Odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:258_4: Nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi?
atk-s0305a0:258_5: Parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccikaṅgāratattaayasalākagūthādīni gahetvā paraṃ paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:258_8: Esa attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati?
atk-s0305a0:258_9: Appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake patissatī”ti
atk-s0305a0:258_10: evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi,
atk-s0305a0:258_12: assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:258_14: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:258_15: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa byāpādassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:259_1: Api ca cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0305a0:260_4: kākamāsakabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0305a0:260_5: catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassapi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0305a0:260_10: mahākassapattherasadise pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:260_12: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:260_13: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa thinamiddhassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:261_1: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0305a0:262_0: Bāhusaccenapi hi ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:262_7: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:262_8: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīne uddhaccakukkucce uddhaccassa arahattamaggena,
atk-s0305a0:263_1: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0305a0:264_1: pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:264_5: saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:264_7: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:264_8: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnāya vicikicchāya sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:264_9: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi nivattetvā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0305a0:266_1: Dutiye sambahulāti vinayapariyāyena tayo janā sambahulāti vuccanti,
atk-s0305a0:266_10: Yathā “gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhantapuriso taṃ gāmaṃ apattopi “kahaṃ itthannāmo”ti vutte “gāmaṃ gato”ti vuccati, evaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:266_11: Paribbājakānaṃ ārāmoti jetavanassa avidūre aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo atthi,
atk-s0305a0:266_13: Samaṇo āvusoti āvuso tumhākaṃ satthā samaṇo gotamo.
atk-s0305a0:267_0: Mayampi kho āvuso sāvakānaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ desemāti titthiyānaṃ samaye “pañca nīvaraṇā pahātabbā,
atk-s0305a0:267_2: Te pana ārāmaṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhatvā aññaṃ olokento viya aññavihitakā viya hutvā bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0305a0:267_3: Tato “samaṇo gotamo ‘idaṃ pajahatha idaṃ bhāvethā’ti vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā attano ārāmaṃ gantvā ārāmamajjhe
atk-s0305a0:267_4: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā upaṭṭhāyakaupaṭṭhāyikāhi parivutā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā kāyaṃ unnāmetvā attano sayambhūñāṇena
atk-s0305a0:268_0: Idha no āvusoti ettha idhāti imasmiṃ paññāpane.
atk-s0305a0:268_4: Dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesananti yadidaṃ samaṇassa vā gotamassa dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ amhākaṃ dhammadesanaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:268_5: amhākaṃ vā dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ samaṇassa gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ ārabbha nānākaraṇaṃ vucceyya,
atk-s0305a0:269_2: Kiṃ pana te pahontā evaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0305a0:269_4: Na hi te ettakaṃ kathaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkonti “āvuso tumhākaṃ samaye pañca nīvaraṇā pahātabbā nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a0:270_1: Na ceva sampāyissantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0305a0:270_2: Uttariñca vighātanti asampāyanato uttarimpi dukkhaṃ āpajjissanti.
atk-s0305a0:270_11: Evaṃ tīṇi ṭhānāni loke pakkhipitvā dve pajāyāti,
atk-s0305a0:270_12: pañcahipi sattalokameva pariyādiyitvā etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke devaṃ vā manussaṃ vā na samanupassāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0305a0:270_13: Ito vā pana sutvāti ito vā pana mama sāsanato sutvā.
atk-s0305a0:270_14: Ito sutvā hi tathāgato tathāgatasāvakopi ārādheyya,
atk-s0305a0:271_0: Idāni attano tesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittārādhanaṃ dassento katamo ca bhikkhave pariyāyotiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:271_1: Tattha ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandoti attano pañcakkhandhe ārabbha uppannachandarāgo.
atk-s0305a0:271_2: Bahiddhā kāmacchandoti paresaṃ pañcakkhandhe ārabbha uppannachandarāgo.
atk-s0305a0:271_6: Ajjhattaṃ dhammesu vicikicchāti attano khandhesu vimati.
atk-s0305a0:271_7: Bahiddhā dhammesu vicikicchāti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu mahāvicikicchā.
atk-s0305a0:271_8: Ajjhattaṃ dhammesu satīti ajjhattike saṅkhāre paṭiggaṇhantassa uppannā sati.
atk-s0305a0:271_9: Bahiddhā dhammesu satīti bahiddhā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati.
atk-s0305a0:272_3: yāva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti evaṃ kāyapayogaṃ vinā uppannavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:273_2: upekkhāti ime attano khandhārammaṇattā lokiyāva honti,
atk-s0305a0:273_4: Avitakkaavicārā pana pītisamādhī kiñcāpi rūpāvacarā honti,
atk-s0305a0:273_5: rūpāvacare pana bojjhaṅgā na labbhantīti lokuttarāva honti.
atk-s0305a0:273_6: Ye ca therā brahmavihāravipassanāpādakajjhānādīsu bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
atk-s0305a0:273_8: Bojjhaṅgesu hi arūpāvacare pītiyeva ekantena na labbhati,
atk-s0305a0:275_3: sabbatthikaṃ vadāmīti loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbakammikāmaccaṃ viya ca sabbattha icchitabbaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0305a0:275_5: yathā ca sabbakammiko amacco yodhakammampi karoti mantakammampi paṭihārakammampīti sabbakiccāni sādheti,
atk-s0305a0:275_8: na sakkā vinā satiyā etaṃ sampādetuṃ,
atk-s0305a0:277_1: Catutthe mettāsahagatena cetasātiādi sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-s0305a0:277_3: sāvakānaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ desemāti idampi te purimanayeneva satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā vadanti.
atk-s0305a0:277_4: Titthiyānañhi samaye pañcanīvaraṇappahānaṃ vā mettādibrahmavihārabhāvanā vā natthi.
atk-s0305a0:277_5: Kiṃ gatikā hotīti kiṃ nipphatti hoti.
atk-s0305a0:278_6: Asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto.
atk-s0305a0:278_10: Paṭikūle pana aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:278_15: Appaṭikūlappaṭikūlesu hi tadeva asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto paṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:278_16: Paṭikūlāpaṭikūlesu ca tadeva mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:278_17: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ pana chaḷaṅgupekkhaṃ pavattayamāno “appaṭikūle
atk-s0305a0:278_18: ca paṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajāno”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:279_0: Ettāvatā ca imassa bhikkhuno mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0305a0:279_1: arahattaṃ pattassa saha vipassanāya maggasambojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyiddhiyā ca dassitattā desanā vinivaṭṭetabbā siyā.
atk-s0305a0:279_2: Idaṃ pana mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasantopi yo arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:279_3: yasmā tassa arahattaparamā mettā na hoti.
atk-s0305a0:279_6: Tasmā tassa dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0305a0:279_7: Parato sabbaso vā pana rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādīsupi iminā nayena puna desanārambhapayojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:281_0: Kasmā panetāsaṃ mettādīnaṃ subhaparamāditā vuttā bhagavatāti?
atk-s0305a0:281_3: athassa appaṭikūlaparicayā appaṭikūlesu parisuddhavaṇṇesu nīlādīsu cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a0:282_0: Karuṇāvihārissa uṇhābhighātādirūpanimittaṃ sattadukkhaṃ samanupassantassa karuṇāya pavattisambhavato rūpe ādīnavo parividito hoti,
atk-s0305a0:282_1: athassa parividitarūpādīnavattā pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññataraṃ ugghāṭetvā rūpanissaraṇe ākāse cittaṃ upasaṃharato
atk-s0305a0:283_0: Muditāvihārissa pana tena tena pāmojjakāraṇena uppannapāmojjasattānaṃ viññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa muditāya
atk-s0305a0:283_2: athassa anukkamādhigataṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ atikkamma ākāsanimittagocare viññāṇe cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a0:284_2: sampattasukhato vā mā vigacchantū”ti ābhogābhāvato sukhadukkhādiparamatthagāhavimukhasambhavato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhacittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:284_3: Athassa paramatthagāhato vimukhabhāvaparicitacittassa paramatthato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhacittassa ca
atk-s0305a0:284_4: anukkamādhigataṃ viññāṇāñcāyatanaṃ samatikkammasambhavato avijjamāne paramatthabhūtassa viññāṇassa abhāve
atk-s0305a0:284_5: cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a0:286_4: Nissaraṇanti tividhaṃ kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ samucchedanissaraṇanti.
atk-s0305a0:286_9: Attatthampītiādīsu arahattasaṅkhāto attano attho attattho nāma,
atk-s0305a0:287_1: byāpādassa nissaraṇantiādīsu hi dveva nissaraṇāni vikkhambhananissaraṇañca samucchedanissaraṇañca.
atk-s0305a0:287_2: Tattha byāpādassa tāva mettāya paṭhamajjhānaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:288_0: Yā panettha seyyathāpi brāhmaṇa udapatto saṃsaṭṭho lākhāya vātiādikā upamā vuttā,
atk-s0305a0:288_5: Sevālapaṇakapariyonaddhoti tilabījakādibhedena sevālena vā nīlamaṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇena vā udakapiṭṭhiṃ chādetvā nibbattapaṇakena pariyonaddho.
atk-s0305a0:288_11: Imasmiṃ sutte bhagavā tīhi bhavehi desanaṃ nivattetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0305a0:290_2: Taggha bhagavā nīvaraṇāti ekaṃsena bhagavā nīvaraṇā.
atk-s0305a0:290_5: Sopi me paṭippassaddhoti tassa kira satthu santike sītalaṃ utusappāyaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa kāyadaratho paṭipassambhi,
atk-s0305a0:290_7: Apica maggenevassa etaṃ ubhayampi passaddhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:293_1: Sattamādīsu aṭṭhikasaññāti aṭṭhikaṃ aṭṭhikanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0305a0:293_2: Taṃ panetaṃ bhāvayato yāva nimittaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:293_4: Nimitte pana uppanne chavicammāni neva upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0305a0:293_5: saṅkhavaṇṇo suddhaaṭṭhikasaṅghāṭova upaṭṭhāti hatthikkhandhagataṃ dhammikatissarājānaṃ olokentassa sāmaṇerassa viya,
atk-s0305a0:293_6: paṭimagge hasamānaṃ itthiṃ olokentassa cetiyapabbatavāsino tissattherassa viya cāti.
atk-s0305a0:293_8: Sati vā upādiseseti gahaṇasese upādānasese vijjamānamhi.
atk-s0305a0:295_3: Vinicchayakathā panettha saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttā.
atk-s0305a0:298_3: maraṇapaṭibaddhaṃ me jīvita”nti abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0305a0:298_5: Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāti sakalalokasmiṃ anabhiratiṃ uppādentassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0305a0:301_1: Satipaṭṭhānasaṃyuttassa paṭhame ambapālivaneti ambapāliyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyā ropite ambavane.
atk-s0305a0:301_3: Sā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā tattha vihāraṃ kāretvā tathāgatassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0305a0:303_0: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0305a0:305_0: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi saṃkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
atk-s0305a0:305_1: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya,
atk-s0305a0:305_3: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
atk-s0305a0:305_5: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0305a0:305_7: Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa adhigamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0305a0:305_9: Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0305a0:305_11: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0305a0:306_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā sattahi padehi ekāyanamaggassa vaṇṇo bhāsito,
atk-s0305a0:306_9: nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ desanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:306_12: Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi kambalavāṇijādayo kambalādīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ viya.
atk-s0305a0:307_6: tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0305a0:307_9: satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi taṃ suṇātha. Ko ca,
atk-s0305a0:307_12: Āharasamudayā kāyasamudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vutto.
atk-s0305a0:308_2: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0305a0:309_0: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0305a0:309_7: iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:310_5: Catassopi hi etā satiyo magganaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a0:310_9: Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0305a0:310_10: ādito paṭṭhāya ca nibbānatthikehi maggiyantīti tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuttā.
atk-s0305a0:310_11: Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti.
atk-s0305a0:311_4: Ayañhi bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati,
atk-s0305a0:311_18: So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0305a0:312_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātapatīti ātāpo,
atk-s0305a0:312_6: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati.
atk-s0305a0:312_7: Na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi,
atk-s0305a0:312_11: Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:312_12: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0305a0:312_14: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti,
atk-s0305a0:312_16: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati,
atk-s0305a0:312_17: tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:313_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañjassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:313_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0305a0:313_3: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0305a0:313_4: Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0305a0:313_7: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:313_11: Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a0:317_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:319_2: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ suññatadhammassa aniccādisattaanupassanānaṃ “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0305a0:319_6: vitthāro pana dīghamajjhimaṭṭhakathāsu satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:321_3: Abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamanaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:321_6: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a0:321_8: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato onamanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a0:321_10: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a0:323_4: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kiṃ nu me ettha gatena attho atthi,
atk-s0305a0:323_8: saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a0:323_9: Mahāvihārasmiñhi dakkhiṇadvāre ṭhatvā mahācetiyaṃ olokentā tiṃsasahassabhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0305a0:324_1: mahācetiyassa samantā kucchivedikāya heṭṭhimabhāgato paṭṭhāya paññāyanaṭṭhāne yattha yattha dve pādā sakkā honti samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ,
atk-s0305a0:324_2: tattha tattha ekapaduddhāre tiṃsatiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti sakkā vatu”nti.
atk-s0305a0:324_5: There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a0:325_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:325_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti,
atk-s0305a0:325_4: attano vibhavānurūpā itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti.
atk-s0305a0:325_13: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ kārentesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti,
atk-s0305a0:326_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-s0305a0:326_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a0:326_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:326_6: “mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā,
atk-s0305a0:326_10: iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukhā hutvā olokethā”ti āha.
atk-s0305a0:326_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a0:326_12: Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ janānaṃ atthāya jātaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:326_13: Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:327_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsakammaṭṭhānesu attano cittarucikaṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0305a0:327_1: gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a0:328_3: ekacco pana neva harati na paccāharati,
atk-s0305a0:329_0: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā tathā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ majjhimayāme seyyaṃ kappetvā,
atk-s0305a0:329_2: pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a0:329_4: So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjitvā
atk-s0305a0:329_5: bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a0:329_6: manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:329_9: sopānapādamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ ce,
atk-s0305a0:329_10: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:329_12: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:329_13: Cetiyaṃ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-s0305a0:329_14: So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṃ hatthena gaṇhanto viya
atk-s0305a0:329_15: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0305a0:330_0: Atha naṃ manussā disvā “ayyo no āgato”ti paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ na niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0305a0:330_1: tāva pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti,
atk-s0305a0:330_4: janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-s0305a0:330_6: tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammaṃ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a0:330_7: nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0305a0:331_0: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-s0305a0:331_1: Porāṇakabhikkhū kira na “amhākaṃ upajjhāyo ācariyo”ti mukhaṃ oloketvā vattaṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a0:331_13: edisā nāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthī”ti tesaṃ guṇe kathayanto gacchati.
atk-s0305a0:332_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-s0305a0:332_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-s0305a0:332_5: pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivati.
atk-s0305a0:332_6: Athassa dvittikkhattuṃ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejo upādiṇṇakaṃ muñcitvā anupādiṇṇakaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0305a0:332_7: ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṃ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-s0305a0:332_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-s0305a0:332_9: āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva āgacchati.
atk-s0305a0:332_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
atk-s0305a0:332_12: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ na taṃ āsanamatthi,
atk-s0305a0:332_13: yattha yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-s0305a0:333_1: sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetovinibandhabaddhacitto viharanto “kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”tipi saññaṃ
atk-s0305a0:333_2: akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho
atk-s0305a0:333_4: Ayaṃ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0305a0:334_0: Yo panāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati cāti vutto,
atk-s0305a0:334_2: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti “āvuso,
atk-s0305a0:334_7: tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne,
atk-s0305a0:334_10: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu pāsāṇā honti,
atk-s0305a0:334_17: ananucchavikaṃ te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati,
atk-s0305a0:334_18: tathā asakkonto nisīdatīti so eva nayo.
atk-s0305a0:334_20: taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-s0305a0:334_23: paṭinivattitvā purimapadesaṃyeva eti ālindakavāsī mahāphussadevatthero viya.
atk-s0305a0:335_0: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi.
atk-s0305a0:335_1: Manussāpi sudaṃ antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṃ tathā gacchantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0305a0:335_5: So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a0:335_6: Arahattappattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:335_7: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:335_8: Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsīmahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi –
atk-s0305a0:335_11: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti,
atk-s0305a0:335_13: Tato “paṭicchādetha tumhe”ti nibaddho āmāti paṭijānitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0305a0:336_1: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento paṭhamaṃ tāva “bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī”ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:336_2: Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a0:336_3: So kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattanto gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā
atk-s0305a0:336_4: “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kacchakarakato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0305a0:336_7: “Mā me bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vā vandituṃ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī”ti “ajja, bhante,
atk-s0305a0:336_8: katimī”ti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ vā pañhaṃ vā pucchito pana udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti.
atk-s0305a0:337_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca.
atk-s0305a0:337_3: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:337_9: “kiṃ nu kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti,
atk-s0305a0:337_13: Etha ne aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti sabbe vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:337_14: Tato yo tesu cakkhumā puriso, so āha –
atk-s0305a0:337_20: Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāyaṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0305a0:338_1: kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā bhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ
atk-s0305a0:338_2: gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-s0305a0:338_5: Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati.
atk-s0305a0:338_6: Na hi javena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi.
atk-s0305a0:338_7: Visamabhūmibhāgapattaṃ pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati.
atk-s0305a0:338_8: Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0305a0:338_9: antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto
atk-s0305a0:338_12: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya…pe…
atk-s0305a0:338_13: bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭipassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:338_14: evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaroti.
atk-s0305a0:338_15: Ayaṃ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0305a0:339_0: Imaṃ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti,
atk-s0305a0:339_13: atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti,
atk-s0305a0:339_14: seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo mahāpañño vā,
atk-s0305a0:339_32: Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati paccāharati ca,
atk-s0305a0:340_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu –
atk-s0305a0:340_6: tathā asammuyhanto abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:340_7: iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamati.
atk-s0305a0:340_8: Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0305a0:340_11: vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0305a0:341_0: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0305a0:341_5: tattha tattheva pabbapabbaṃ sandhisandhi odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya taṭataṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-s0305a0:346_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:346_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato anupekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:346_5: Iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-s0305a0:347_0: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:347_1: Taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:348_3: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato nābhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0305a0:348_11: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me anudisaṃ ālokayato’…pe…
atk-s0305a0:349_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0305a0:349_2: tasmā khandhadhātuāyatanakammaṭṭhānikehi attano kamaṭṭhānavaseneva kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:350_0: “Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi,
atk-s0305a0:350_1: ‘ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:350_2: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati,
atk-s0305a0:350_5: tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ uppajjatī”ti evaṃ pajānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a0:354_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0305a0:354_8: ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0305a0:354_11: Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesu “ayaṃ itthī,
atk-s0305a0:355_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthamāgate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakakiccanipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:355_1: taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-s0305a0:355_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:355_3: evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ
atk-s0305a0:356_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:356_1: tāni saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-s0305a0:356_4: Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma,
atk-s0305a0:356_5: evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-s0305a0:356_6: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṃ
atk-s0305a0:357_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpā ca rūpakkhandho,
atk-s0305a0:357_6: evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a0:357_13: evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a0:357_20: evametesaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a0:358_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggaṇhitvā
atk-s0305a0:358_3: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:358_7: Kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:359_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:359_4: Tattheko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-s0305a0:359_5: Aparo bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0305a0:359_11: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:360_1: mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjesi.
atk-s0305a0:360_3: sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjitthā”ti.
atk-s0305a0:360_6: na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo,
atk-s0305a0:360_7: idāni pana tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito,
atk-s0305a0:360_8: tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0305a0:361_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjanto vā pasārento vā natthi,
atk-s0305a0:361_2: samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hotīti parijānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:362_2: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho,
atk-s0305a0:362_3: “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma.
atk-s0305a0:363_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:364_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi,
atk-s0305a0:364_6: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya.
atk-s0305a0:364_7: Tasmā neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:364_9: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a0:364_11: Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṃ vā karonti domanassaṃ vā.
atk-s0305a0:364_12: Evamevaṃ neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:364_13: na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassanti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:365_1: “imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ labhissāmī”ti evaṃ pattaggahaṇapaccayā paṭilabhitabbaatthavasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:365_6: Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo.
atk-s0305a0:365_8: pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0305a0:366_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi,
atk-s0305a0:366_7: saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:367_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāya
atk-s0305a0:367_1: anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṃ vaṇapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi bhesajjāni ca upanāmenti.
atk-s0305a0:367_6: na te tattha sumanā vā dummanā vā honti.
atk-s0305a0:367_7: Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena bhesajjapaṭiggahamatteneva ca kapālakena tesaṃ attho.
atk-s0305a0:367_8: Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ,
atk-s0305a0:367_10: kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṃ sallakkheti.
atk-s0305a0:368_4: Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi attho attho nāma,
atk-s0305a0:369_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti,
atk-s0305a0:370_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi,
atk-s0305a0:370_2: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a0:370_4: Na koci kuñcikāya na yantakena hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati,
atk-s0305a0:370_5: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṃ uparidantānaṃ musalakiccasādhanaṃ heṭṭhādantānaṃ
atk-s0305a0:370_9: Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṃ kheḷaudakatemitaṃ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci kaṭacchunā
atk-s0305a0:370_10: vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a0:370_12: Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasantharaṃ katvā dhārento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a0:370_14: Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a0:370_16: Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīharako nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a0:370_18: Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca;
atk-s0305a0:370_19: pathavīdhātu dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca;
atk-s0305a0:370_23: viññāṇadhātu tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:371_7: sammakkhanatoti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṭikūlabhāvaṃ paccavekkhaṇatopettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:372_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe.
atk-s0305a0:372_1: Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṃ akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti,
atk-s0305a0:372_5: Karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a0:372_7: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti hoti,
atk-s0305a0:372_10: Patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:373_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṃ karonto natthi,
atk-s0305a0:373_2: Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0305a0:373_3: yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0305a0:373_4: evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti.
atk-s0305a0:373_5: So panāyaṃ evaṃ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa,
atk-s0305a0:373_8: Yathā udakatumbato purāṇaudakaṃ chaḍḍentassa neva taṃ attano hoti na paresaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:374_7: Ettha ca yo ciraṃ gantvā vā caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito iti paṭisañcikkhati “caṅkamanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0305a0:375_0: Yo sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto pañhaṃ vā vissajjento kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto ciraṃ ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno
atk-s0305a0:375_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati “ṭhitakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0305a0:376_0: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṃ nisīditvā aparabhāge nipanno iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a0:377_0: Yo pana nipannakova sajjhāyaṃ karonto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamitvā aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a0:377_2: ayaṃ sutte ca jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a0:378_1: “ayaṃ saddo nāma oṭṭhe ca paṭicca dante ca jivhañca tāluñca paṭicca cittassa ca tadanurūpaṃ payogaṃ paṭicca jāyatī”ti sato sampajāno bhāsati,
atk-s0305a0:378_2: ciraṃ vā pana kālaṃ sajjhāyaṃ katvā dhammaṃ vā kathetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā parivattetvā pañhaṃ vā vissajjetvā
atk-s0305a0:378_3: aparabhāge tuṇhībhūto iti paṭisañcikkhati “bhāsitakāle uppannā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti ayaṃ
atk-s0305a0:379_0: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṃ dhammaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a0:379_5: Evamettha asammohasampajaññaṃ tassa vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a0:381_1: Tatiye evameva panidhekacceti so kira bhikkhu kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā ito cito ca āhiṇḍati,
atk-s0305a0:381_4: Tasmāti yasmā saṃkhittena desanaṃ yācasi, tasmā.
atk-s0305a0:383_1: Catutthe dhammavinayoti dhammoti vā vinayoti vā ubhayametaṃ satthusāsanasseva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:383_4: Samāhitā ekaggacittāti upacārappanāvasena sammā ṭhapitacittā ca ekaggacittā ca.
atk-s0305a0:383_5: Imasmiṃ sutte navakabhikkhūhi ceva khīṇāsavehi ca bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā,
atk-s0305a0:385_11: attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṃ vadamānāti attho.
atk-s0305a0:385_12: Mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvāti uddhanasaṇṭhānena ṭhitesu tīsu leḍḍūsu “ito sene āgacchante ito nikkhamissāmi,
atk-s0305a0:385_13: ito āgacchante ito”ti sallakkhetvā tesu ekaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvā aṭṭhāsi avadamāno.
atk-s0305a0:385_14: Sannayhāti khurappaṃ sannayhamāno viya sannayhitvā suṭṭhu ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0305a0:385_15: Bahuāgato kho myāyanti “mayhaṃ atthāya ayaṃ bahutaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgato,
atk-s0305a0:385_17: idāni maṃ gaṇhissatī”ti ñatvā dāruguḷo viya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi,
atk-s0305a0:385_19: Uraṃ paccatāḷesīti “ekappahāreneva lāpassa sīsaṃ chinditvā gahessāmī”ti pakkhandattā vegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tasmiṃ leḍḍusmiṃ uraṃ patāḷesi.
atk-s0305a0:385_21: Atha lāpo “diṭṭhā vata sattuno piṭṭhī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho tassa hadaye aparāparaṃ caṅkami.
atk-s0305a0:387_3: Lepaṃ oḍḍentīti vaṭarukkhakhīrādīhi yojetvā lepaṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a0:387_4: taṃ makkaṭānaṃ dhuvagamanaṭṭhānanti sallakkhetvā rukkhasākhādīsu ṭhapenti.
atk-s0305a0:387_5: Pañcoḍḍitoti pañcasu ṭhānesu kājadaṇḍakaṃ pavesetvā gahetabbā kājasikkā viya oḍḍito.
atk-s0305a0:389_8: Bahuṃ gaṇhātīti ekaggahaṇena bahuṃ gaṇhantopi punappunaṃ gaṇhantopi bahuṃ gaṇhateva.
atk-s0305a0:389_9: Abhihārānanti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā ukkhipitvā abhihaṭānaṃ dāyānaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:389_11: Nimittaṃ na uggaṇhātīti “imaṃ me kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ vā āhacca ṭhita”nti na jānāti,
atk-s0305a0:389_12: attano cittassa nimittaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0305a0:391_1: Navame beḷuvagāmaketi vesāliyā samīpe evaṃnāmako pādagāmo atthi, tasmiṃ.
atk-s0305a0:391_3: Sandiṭṭhāti tattha tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā.
atk-s0305a0:391_5: Yesaṃ yattha yattha evarūpā bhikkhū atthi,
atk-s0305a0:391_6: te tattha tattha vassaṃ upethāti attho.
atk-s0305a0:392_6: Atha nesaṃ ‘satthā parinibbāyanto amhākaṃ satimattampi na adāsi.
atk-s0305a0:392_8: na evaṃ dūre vaseyyāmā’ti vippaṭisāro bhaveyya.
atk-s0305a0:392_9: Vesāliyā samantā pana vassaṃ vasantā māsassa aṭṭha vāre āgantvā dhammaṃ suṇissanti,
atk-s0305a0:393_4: Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0305a0:393_5: Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena aparāparaṃ parivattanaṃ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno ca adhivāsesi.
atk-s0305a0:393_7: Anapaloketvāti ajānāpetvāva ovādānusāsaniṃ adatvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:393_11: Yena jīvitaṃ saṅkharīyati chijjamānaṃ ghaṭetvā ṭhapīyati,
atk-s0305a0:393_14: Adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā pavattetvā jīvitaṭhapanasamatthaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjeyyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0305a0:394_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā ito pubbe phalasamāpattiṃ na samāpajjatīti?
atk-s0305a0:394_4: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamattassa kaṭṭhapātena vā kaṭhalapātena vā chinnasevālo viya udakaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:394_6: Yā pana rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā mahāvipassanāvasena samāpannā samāpatti,
atk-s0305a0:394_8: Yathā nāma purisena pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca suṭṭhu apabyuḷhasevālo cirena udakaṃ ottharati,
atk-s0305a0:394_9: evameva tato vuṭṭhitassa cirena vedanā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a0:394_10: Iti bhagavā taṃdivasaṃ mahābodhipallaṅke abhinavaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapento viya rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca
atk-s0305a0:394_11: niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā cuddasahākārehi sannetvā mahāvipassanāya vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā “dasamāse mā
atk-s0305a0:394_13: samāpattivikkhambhitā vedanā dasa māse na uppajjiyeva.
atk-s0305a0:395_0: Gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhito.
atk-s0305a0:395_1: Madhurakajāto viyāti sañjātagarubhāvo sañjātathaddhabhāvo sūle uttāsitapuriso viya.
atk-s0305a0:395_4: Dhammāpi maṃ nappaṭibhantīti satipaṭṭhānadhammā mayhaṃ pākaṭā na hontīti dīpeti.
atk-s0305a0:396_0: Anantaraṃ abāhiranti dhammavasena vā puggalavasena vā ubhayaṃ akatvā.
atk-s0305a0:396_1: “Ettakaṃ dhammaṃ parassa na desessāmī”ti hi cintento dhammaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma,
atk-s0305a0:396_2: “ettakaṃ parassa desessāmī”ti cintento bāhiraṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0305a0:396_3: “Imassa puggalassa desessāmī”ti cintento pana puggalaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma,
atk-s0305a0:396_4: “imassa na desessāmī”ti cintento puggalaṃ bāhiraṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0305a0:396_6: Ācariyamuṭṭhīti yathā bāhirakānaṃ ācariyamuṭṭhi nāma hoti,
