atk-s0305a0:396_7: daharakāle kassaci akathetvā pacchimakāle maraṇamañce nipannā piyamanāpassa antevāsikassa kathenti,
atk-s0305a0:396_8: evaṃ tathāgatassa “idaṃ mahallakakāle pacchimaṭhāne kathessāmī”ti muṭṭhiṃ katvā pariharitvā ṭhapitaṃ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0305a0:397_0: Ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghanti ahameva bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmīti vā,
atk-s0305a0:397_1: mamuddesikoti ahaṃ uddisitabbaṭṭhena uddeso assāti mamuddesiko,
atk-s0305a0:397_2: mameva uddissitvā maṃ paccāsīsamāno bhikkhusaṅgho hotu mama accayena mā vā ahosi,
atk-s0305a0:397_3: yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotūti iti vā pana yassa assāti attho.
atk-s0305a0:397_4: Na evaṃ hotīti bodhipallaṅkeyeva issāmaccherānaṃ vigatattā evaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0305a0:397_9: Maññeti jarasakaṭaṃ viya veṭhamissakena maññe yāpeti,
atk-s0305a0:398_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ pakāsento yasmiṃ ānanda samayetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:398_3: Tasmātihānandāti yasmā iminā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsu hoti,
atk-s0305a0:398_4: tasmā tumhepi tadatthāya evaṃ viharathāti dasseti.
atk-s0305a0:398_5: Attadīpāti mahāsamuddagatā dīpaṃ viya attānaṃ dīpaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0305a0:398_9: Ettha ca dhammoti navavidho lokuttaradhammo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:398_15: Evaṃ sabbaṃ tamasotaṃ chinditvā ativiya agge uttamabhāve ete, ānanda,
atk-s0305a0:398_19: sabbesaṃ tesaṃ catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0305a0:400_1: Dasame tenupasaṅkamīti tasmiṃ upassaye kammaṭṭhānakammikā bhikkhuniyo atthi,
atk-s0305a0:400_3: Uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesanti pubbavisesato aparaṃ uḷāravisesaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:401_2: Bahiddhā vā cittaṃ vikkhipatīti bahiddhā vā puthuttārammaṇe cittuppādo vikkhipati.
atk-s0305a0:401_3: Kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṃ paṇidahitabbanti evaṃ kilesapariḷāhe ca līnatte ca bahiddhāvikkhepe
atk-s0305a0:401_5: kismiñcideva pasādanīye pasādāvahe buddhādīsu aññatarasmiṃ ṭhāne kammaṭṭhānacittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:401_6: Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti ārammaṇe sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ ṭhapiyati.
atk-s0305a0:401_10: Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesavitakkaṃ na vitakketi,
atk-s0305a0:401_13: Ajjhattaṃ satimā sukhamasmīti gocarajjhatte pavattāya satiyā “satimāhamasmi sukhito cā”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a0:402_3: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa mahantaṃ ucchubhāraṃ ukkhipitvā yantasālaṃ nentassa kilantakilantakāle
atk-s0305a0:402_4: bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ucchukhaṇḍaṃ khāditvā puna ukkhipitvā gamanaṃ hoti;
atk-s0305a0:402_5: evameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa kāyapariḷāhādīsu uppannesu taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a0:402_6: buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā bhāvanā pavattā,
atk-s0305a0:402_8: Tassa pana purisassa ucchubhāraṃ yantasālaṃ netvā pīḷetvā rasapānaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a0:402_9: matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahattaṃ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:403_0: Bahiddhāti mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya bahi aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe.
atk-s0305a0:403_2: Atha pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānātīti ettha kammaṭṭhānavasena vā sarīravasena vā desanāvasena vā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:404_0: Tattha kammaṭṭhāne tāva kammaṭṭhānassa abhiniveso pure nāma,
atk-s0305a0:404_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kilesapariḷāhassa vā līnattassa vā bahiddhāvikkhepassa vā
atk-s0305a0:404_3: uppajjituṃ okāsaṃ adento sudantagoṇe yojetvā sārento viya caturassacchidde sutacchitaṃ caturassaghaṭikaṃ
atk-s0305a0:404_4: pakkhipanto viya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā atiṭṭhanto alagganto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:404_5: so puresaṅkhātassa kammaṭṭhānābhinivesassa pacchāsaṅkhātassa arahattassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a0:405_0: Sarīre pana pādaṅgulīnaṃ aggapabbāni pure nāma,
atk-s0305a0:405_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu pādaṅgulīnaṃ aggapabbaaṭṭhikesu abhinivisitvā byābhaṅgiyā yavakalāpaṃ mocento viya
atk-s0305a0:405_3: vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena aṭṭhīni pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ vāretvā
atk-s0305a0:405_5: so puresaṅkhātānaṃ aggapādaṅgulipabbānaṃ pacchāsaṅkhātassa sīsakaṭāhassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a0:406_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu kesesu abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsavasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṃ
atk-s0305a0:406_3: uppattiṃ vāretvā yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0305a0:406_4: So puresaṅkhātānaṃ kesānaṃ pacchāsaṅkhātassa matthaluṅgassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a0:407_3: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa guḷabhāraṃ labhitvā attano gāmaṃ atiharantassa antarā aṭṭhapetvāva
atk-s0305a0:407_4: uccaṅge pakkhittāni guḷakhaṇḍādīni khādanīyāni khādantassa attano gāmeyeva otaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:407_5: evameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ āraddhabhāvanassa kāyapariḷāhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ vāretvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā,
atk-s0305a0:407_7: Tassa pana purisassa taṃ guḷabhāraṃ attano gāmaṃ netvā ñātīhi saddhiṃ paribhogo viya imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0305a0:407_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahattaṃ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:411_1: Dutiyavaggassa dutiye nālandāyanti nālandāti evaṃnāmake nagare,
atk-s0305a0:411_5: So bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasanno tasmiṃ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhagavato vihāraṃ katvā niyyātesi.
atk-s0305a0:411_6: So vihāro jīvakambavanaṃ viya pāvārikambavanantveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0305a0:412_4: Sambodhiyanti sabbaññutaññāṇe arahattamaggañāṇe vā arahattamaggeneva hi buddhaguṇā nippadesā gahitā honti,
atk-s0305a0:413_1: Ayañhi uḷārasaddo “uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantī”tiādīsu madhure āgacchati.
atk-s0305a0:413_2: “Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsāya pasaṃsatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0305a0:413_7: Ekaṃso gahitoti anussavena vā ācariyaparamparāya vā itikirāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā ākāraparivitakkena
atk-s0305a0:413_8: vā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā vā takkahetu vā nayahetu vā akathetvā paccakkhato ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viya
atk-s0305a0:413_12: vane unnādayantena sīhena viya uttamanādo naditoti attho.
atk-s0305a0:414_0: Kiṃ nu te sāriputtāti imaṃ desanaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0305a0:414_2: Ekacco hi sīhanādaṃ naditvā attano sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:414_5: Yathā dhamamānaṃ aparisuddhaṃ lohaṃ jhāyitvā aṅgāro hoti,
atk-s0305a0:414_7: Eko sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dāpiyamāno dātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:414_11: Tena naṃ bhagavā “anuyogakkhamo aya”nti ñatvā sīhanāde anuyogadāpanatthaṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a0:415_0: Tattha sabbe teti sabbe te tayā.
atk-s0305a0:415_3: maggasamādhinā phalasamādhinā lokiyalokuttarena samādhinā evaṃsamādhīti attho.
atk-s0305a0:415_5: Evaṃvihārinoti ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahitopi puna kasmā gahitameva gaṇhatīti ce.
atk-s0305a0:415_8: Tasmā evaṃ nirodhasamāpattivihārino te bhagavanto ahesunti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a0:416_5: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitehi nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a0:416_6: Aniccānupassanādikā satta anupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīkavasena pariccattāhi niccasaññādīhi vimuttattā tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a0:416_7: Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṃ samucchinnehi kilesehi vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a0:416_8: Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni maggānubhāvena kilesānaṃ paṭipassaddhante uppannattā paṭipassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a0:416_9: Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0305a0:416_10: Iti imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ vimuttīnaṃ vasena evaṃ vimuttāti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a0:417_0: Kiṃ pana te sāriputta ye te bhavissantīti atītā tāva niruddhā apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatā dīpasikhā viya nibbutā,
atk-s0305a0:417_1: evaṃ niruddhe apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gate tvaṃ kathaṃ jānissasi,
atk-s0305a0:417_2: anāgatabuddhānaṃ pana guṇā kiṃ tayā attano cittena paricchinditvā viditāti pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:418_0: Kiṃ pana tyāhaṃ sāriputta etarahīti anāgatāpi buddhā ajātā anibbattā anuppannā,
atk-s0305a0:418_2: Tesañhi jānanaṃ apade ākāse padadassanaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0305a0:418_6: kiṃ pana mayhaṃ guṇā attano cetasā paricchinditvā viditā tayāti anuyuñjanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:418_7: Thero pana pucchitapucchite “no hetaṃ bhante”ti paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0305a0:419_2: Kiṃ so attano viditaṭṭhāne paṭikkhepaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a0:419_6: Thero kira anuyoge āraddhe evaṃ aññāsi “nāyaṃ anuyogo sāvakapāramīñāṇe,
atk-s0305a0:419_7: sabbaññutaññāṇe pana ayaṃ anuyogo”ti attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ akatvāva aviditaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a0:419_9: bhagavā mayhaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ buddhānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttikāraṇajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0305a0:420_1: Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā evaṃ ñāṇe asati tayā evaṃ kathitanti vadati.
atk-s0305a0:420_2: Dhammanvayoti dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassa anuyogaṃ anugantvā uppannaṃ anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito,
atk-s0305a0:420_3: sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvāva iminā ākārena jānāmi bhagavāti vadati.
atk-s0305a0:420_5: Yathā ca sabbaññutaññāṇassa pamāṇaṃ vā pariyanto vā natthi,
atk-s0305a0:420_8: iminā anuttaro iminā anuttaro satthā”ti jānāti.
atk-s0305a0:421_0: Idāni taṃ nayaggāhaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpi bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:421_1: Tattha yasmā majjhimadese nagarassa uddhāpapākārādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā,
atk-s0305a0:421_4: Tasmā taṃ aggahetvā paccantimaṃ nagaranti āha.
atk-s0305a0:421_8: Bahudvāre hi nagare bahūhi paṇḍitadovārikehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:421_10: Therassa ca paññāya sadiso añño natthi,
atk-s0305a0:421_11: tasmā attano paṇḍitabhāvassa opammatthaṃ ekaṃyeva dovārikaṃ dassetuṃ “ekadvāra”nti āha.
atk-s0305a0:422_6: Cetaso upakkileseti pañcanīvaraṇā cittaṃ upakkilissanti kiliṭṭhaṃ karonti upatāpenti viheṭhenti,
atk-s0305a0:422_8: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti,
atk-s0305a0:422_10: Supatiṭṭhitacittāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittā hutvā.
atk-s0305a0:422_11: Satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtanti satta bojjhaṅge yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvā.
atk-s0305a0:422_12: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti arahattaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0305a0:423_6: Dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero panāha “satipaṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ gahetvā bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyya,
atk-s0305a0:423_8: Iti thero sabbabuddhānaṃ nīvaraṇappahāne satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sambodhiyañca majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇarajatānaṃ viya nānattābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0305a0:424_14: nagaraṃ pavisanakanikkhamanakā oḷārikapāṇā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannā buddhā,
atk-s0305a0:424_15: dovārikassa tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya āyasmato sāriputtassa atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ buddhānaṃ sīlasamathādīhi pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-s0305a0:424_17: “evamahaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammanvayena nayaggāhena jānāmī”ti attano sīhanādassa anuyogo dinno hoti.
atk-s0305a0:425_4: “pubbaṇhe me kathita”nti mā majjhanhikādīsu na kathayittha,
atk-s0305a0:425_5: “ajja vā me kathita”nti mā paradivasādīsu na kathayitthāti attho.
atk-s0305a0:425_6: Sā pahīyissatīti “sāriputtasadisopi nāma ñāṇajavanasampanno sāvako buddhānaṃ cittācāraṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:425_7: evaṃ appameyyā tathāgatā”ti cintentānaṃ yā tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā,
atk-s0305a0:427_2: Nālakagāmaketi rājagahassa avidūre attano kulasantake evaṃnāmake gāme.
atk-s0305a0:427_3: Cundo samaṇuddesoti ayaṃ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko,
atk-s0305a0:427_4: taṃ bhikkhū anupasampannakāle “cundo samaṇuddeso”ti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva samudācariṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:428_1: bhagavā kira vutthavasso veḷuvagāmakā nikkhamitvā “sāvatthiṃ gamissāmī”ti āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0305a0:428_2: Dhammasenāpati bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ gato,
atk-s0305a0:428_3: so tattha antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññāpetvā pāde
atk-s0305a0:428_5: Athassa yathā paricchedena tato vuṭṭhitassa ayaṃ parivitakko udapādi “buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṃ parinibbāyanti,
atk-s0305a0:428_7: tato “aggasāvakā paṭhama”nti ñatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0305a0:428_8: So “sattāhameva me āyusaṅkhārā pavattissantī”ti ñatvā “kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0305a0:429_2: ahaṃ kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti punappunaṃ cintento mātaraṃ ārabbha satiṃ uppādesi –
atk-s0305a0:429_3: “mayhaṃ mātā sattannaṃ arahantānaṃ mātā hutvāpi buddhadhammasaṅghesu appasannā,
atk-s0305a0:429_6: Sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā “kassa desanāya abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento “mameva dhammadesanāya bhavissati,
atk-s0305a0:429_11: Tathā hissa samacittasuttantadesanādivase koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0305a0:429_13: aññesu ca ṭhānesu anekā abhisamayā dissanti,
atk-s0305a0:429_14: there ca cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattāneva asīti kulasahassāni,
atk-s0305a0:429_16: Tasmā mātaraṃ micchādassanā mocetvā jātovarakeyeva parinibbāyissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā “ajjeva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0305a0:430_0: Bhikkhū senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya therassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:430_1: Thero senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā divāṭṭhānadvāre ṭhatvā divāṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā “idaṃ dāni pacchimadassanaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:430_2: puna āgamanaṃ natthī”ti pañcasatabhikkhūhi parivuto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “anujānātu me bhante bhagavā,
atk-s0305a0:430_6: Buddhā pana yasmā “parinibbāhī”ti vutte maraṇavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentīti,
atk-s0305a0:430_7: “mā parinibbāhī”ti vutte vaṭṭassa guṇaṃ kathentīti micchādiṭṭhikā dosaṃ āropessanti,
atk-s0305a0:430_16: idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikānaṃ tādisassa bhikkhuno dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0305a0:431_1: “satthā mayhaṃ iddhivikubbanapubbaṅgamaṃ dhammadesanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a0:431_2: ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a0:431_3: puna dvitālappamāṇaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a0:431_4: etenupāyena sattatālappamāṇaṃ abbhuggantvā anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a0:431_7: Uparimena vā heṭṭhimena vā upaḍḍhakāyena katheti adissamānenapi dissamānenapi,
atk-s0305a0:431_15: kālena mahābrahmāti evaṃ anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0305a0:431_17: Thero oruyha dasabalassa pāde vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:432_0: Thero alattakavaṇṇe hatthe pasāretvā satthu suvaṇṇakacchapasadise pāde gopphakesu gahetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0305a0:432_1: imesaṃ pādānaṃ vandanatthāya kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0305a0:432_3: ito dāni paṭṭhāya paṭisandhivasena na puna ekaṭṭhāne sannipāto samāgamo atthi,
atk-s0305a0:432_5: anekehi buddhasatasahassehi paviṭṭhaṃ ajaraṃ amaraṃ khemaṃ sukhaṃ sītalaṃ abhayaṃ nibbānapuraṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0305a0:432_6: sace me kiñci kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha,
atk-s0305a0:432_11: na kho pana te kiñci kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā mayhaṃ aruccanakaṃ atthi,
atk-s0305a0:433_0: Iti bhagavatā anuññātasamanantaraṃ satthu pāde vanditvā uṭṭhitamatte āyasmante sāriputte sinerucakkavāḷahimavantaparibhaṇḍapabbate dhārayamānāpi –
atk-s0305a0:433_1: “ajja imaṃ guṇarāsiṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya ekappahāreneva viravamānā mahāpathavī yāva udakapariyantā akampi,
atk-s0305a0:434_1: “dhammasenāpatiṃ paṭipādessāmī”ti dhammāsanā vuṭṭhāya gandhakuṭiabhimukho gantvā maṇiphalake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:434_2: Thero tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā –
atk-s0305a0:434_3: “bhagavā ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa upari anomadassīsammāsambuddhassa pādamūle nipajjitvā tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ patthesiṃ,
atk-s0305a0:434_8: Puna tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ natthī”ti vatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha yāva dassanavisayā abhimukhova paṭikkamitvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0305a0:434_9: Puna mahāpathavī dhāretuṃ asakkontī udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampi.
atk-s0305a0:435_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe catassopi parisā sammāsambuddhaṃ ekakaṃyeva jetavane ohāya niravasesā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:435_7: passissāma na”nti nagaradvārāni nirokāsāni karontā nikkhamitvā gandhamālādihatthā kese vikiritvā –
atk-s0305a0:435_11: kassa hatthe satthāraṃ ṭhapetvā thero pakkanto”tiādinā nayena paridevantā rodantā theraṃ anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:436_1: “sabbesaṃ anatikkamanīyo esa maggo”ti mahājanaṃ ovaditvā – “tumhepi, āvuso,
atk-s0305a0:436_3: mā dasabale pamādaṃ āpajjitthā”ti bhikkhusaṅghampi nivattetvā attano parisāyeva saddhiṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0305a0:436_6: idaṃ idāni gamanaṃ na puna paccāgamanāyā”ti paridevantā anubandhiṃsuyeva. Tepi –
atk-s0305a0:437_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sabbattha ekarattivāsena antarāmagge sattāhaṃ manussānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karonto sāyaṃ
atk-s0305a0:437_2: Atha uparevato nāma therassa bhāgineyyo bahigāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:437_21: daharakāle pabbajitvā mahallakakāle gihī hotukāmo”ti cintentī jātovarakaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā pañcasatānaṃ
atk-s0305a0:437_22: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kāretvā daṇḍadīpikā jāletvā therassa pāhesi.
atk-s0305a0:438_0: Thero bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha jātovarakaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi,
atk-s0305a0:438_2: Tesu gatamattesuyeva therassa kharo ābādho uppajji,
atk-s0305a0:438_7: “mama puttassa pavatti mayhaṃ na ruccatī”ti attano vasanagabbhadvāraṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:439_0: Cattāro mahārājāno “dhammasenāpati kuhiṃ viharatī”ti olokentā nālakagāme jātovarake parinibbānamañce nipanno,
atk-s0305a0:439_8: Tesaṃ gatāvasāne teneva nayena sakko devānamindo.
atk-s0305a0:440_0: Brāhmaṇī devatānaṃ āgamanañca gamanañca disvā “ke nu kho ete mama puttaṃ vanditvā gacchantī”ti therassa gabbhadvāraṃ gantvā “tāta, cunda,
atk-s0305a0:440_11: amhākaṃ satthu paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya khaggahatthā hutvā ārakkhaṃ akaṃsūti.
atk-s0305a0:440_16: amhākaṃ satthu tāvatiṃsato otaraṇakāle pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā otiṇṇoti.
atk-s0305a0:440_17: Tassa tāta gatāvasāne jotayamāno viya ko āgatoti? Upāsike,
atk-s0305a0:440_18: tuyhaṃ bhagavā ca satthā ca mahābrahmā nāma esoti.
atk-s0305a0:440_22: ete nāma kira amhākaṃ satthu jātadivase cattāro mahābrahmāno mahāpurisaṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti.
atk-s0305a0:441_2: kīdiso vata mayhaṃ puttassa bhagavato satthu ānubhāvo bhavissatī”ti cintayantiyā sahasā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ phari. Thero –
atk-s0305a0:441_4: ayaṃ dāni kālo dhammadesanāyā”ti cintetvā “kiṃ cintesi mahāupāsike”ti āha.
atk-s0305a0:441_6: satthu panassa kīdiso bhavissatīti idaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0305a0:441_9: mayhaṃ satthujātakkhaṇe mahābhinikkhamane sambodhiyaṃ dhammacakkappavattane ca dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0305a0:441_10: Sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samo nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a0:441_11: itipi so bhagavāti vitthāretvā buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0305a0:442_0: Brāhmaṇī piyaputtassa dhammadesanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya puttaṃ āha –
atk-s0305a0:442_3: evarūpaṃ nāma amataṃ mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na adāsī”ti. Thero –
atk-s0305a0:442_4: “dinnaṃ dāni me mātu rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā posāvanikamūlaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:443_1: “āvuso catucattālīsaṃ vo vassāni mayā saddhiṃ vicarantānaṃ yaṃ me kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha,
atk-s0305a0:443_3: amhākaṃ chāyā viya tumhe amuñcitvā vicarantānaṃ aruccanakaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a0:443_5: Atha thero mahācīvaraṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā mukhaṃ pidhāya dakkhiṇena passena nipanno satthā viya nava anupubbasamāpattiyo
atk-s0305a0:443_6: anulomapaṭilomato samāpajjitvā puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva catutthajjhānā samāpajji.
atk-s0305a0:443_7: Tato vuṭṭhāya anantaraṃyeva mahāpathaviṃ unnādento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0305a0:444_2: na kiñci kathetī”ti uṭṭhāya piṭṭhipāde parimajjantī parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāsaddaṃ kurumānā pādesu nipatitvā –
atk-s0305a0:444_3: “tāta mayaṃ ito pubbe tava guṇaṃ na jānimhā,
atk-s0305a0:444_4: idāni pana taṃ ādiṃ katvā anekasate anekasahasse anekasatasahasse bhikkhū imasmiṃ nivesane nisīdāpetvā bhojetuṃ na labhimhā,
atk-s0305a0:444_6: vihārasataṃ vihārasahassaṃ kāretuṃ na labhimhā”ti yāva aruṇuggamanā paridevi.
atk-s0305a0:444_7: Aruṇe uggatamatteyeva suvaṇṇakāre pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇagabbhaṃ vivarāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭiyo mahātulāya tulāpetvā –
atk-s0305a0:445_2: pañca kūṭāgārasatāni pañca agghikasatāni ca māpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0305a0:445_3: Iti upāsikāya kāritāni ca vissakammena nimmitāni ca sabbānipi dvesahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0305a0:445_4: Tato nagaramajjhe sāramayaṃ mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā maṇḍapamajjhe mahākūṭāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni parivārasaṅkhepena ṭhapetvā sādhukīḷikaṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:446_1: “ahaṃ therassa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇapupphānaṃ tayo kumbhe kāresi.
atk-s0305a0:446_2: “Therassa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti sakko devarājā aḍḍhateyyakoṭināṭakehi parivārito otari.
atk-s0305a0:446_4: Tattha sāpi upāsikā paṭikkamamānā garubhārattā ekamantaṃ apasakkituṃ asakkontī manussānaṃ antare pati.
atk-s0305a0:446_6: Sā tattheva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane kanakavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0305a0:446_7: Nibbattakkhaṇeyevassā ratanakkhandho viya tigāvutappamāṇo attabhāvo ahosi saṭṭhisakaṭapūrappamāṇaalaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā accharāsahassaparivāritā.
atk-s0305a0:446_11: kiṃ nu kho me kammaṃ kata”nti cintayamānā addasa –
atk-s0305a0:446_12: “mayā sāriputtattherassa parinibbutaṭṭhāne tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi pūjā katā,
atk-s0305a0:446_15: theraṃ nissāya laddhaṃ idāni puññavipākaṃ manussānaṃ kathessāmī”ti saha vimāneneva otari.
atk-s0305a0:447_6: Tampi vimānaṃ tāvadeva āgantvā therassa dārucitakamatthake vehāsaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:447_7: Devadhītā vimānaṃ ākāseyeva ṭhapetvā pathaviṃ otari.
atk-s0305a0:447_11: tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi theraṃ pūjaṃ katvā manussehi madditā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattā,
atk-s0305a0:447_14: puññāni karothā”ti kusalakiriyāya vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā therassa citakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā attano devaṭṭhānaṃyeva gatā.
atk-s0305a0:448_0: Mahājanopi sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷikaṃ kīḷitvā sabbagandhehi citakaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0305a0:448_2: Therassa sarīraṃ citakaṃ āropetvā usīrakalāpakehi ālimpesuṃ.
atk-s0305a0:448_7: mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ sammāsambuddhassa ārocessāmī”ti
atk-s0305a0:448_8: dhātuparissāvanaṃ therassa ca pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0305a0:448_9: Ekaṭṭhānepi ca dve rattiyo avasitvā sabbattha ekarattivāseneva sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a0:448_10: Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha kho cundo samaṇuddesotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:449_0: Tattha yenāyasmā ānandoti yena attano upajjhāyo dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando,
atk-s0305a0:449_2: Kasmā panesa ujukaṃ satthu santikaṃ agantvā therassa santikaṃ agamāsīti?
atk-s0305a0:449_4: Jetavanamahāvihāre pokkharaṇiyaṃ kirassa nhatvā paccuttaritvā sunivatthasupārutassa etadahosi –
atk-s0305a0:449_7: na sakkā mayā ujukameva satthu santikaṃ gantvā kathetuṃ,
atk-s0305a0:449_11: tassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ ādāya satthārā saddhiṃ kathessāmī”ti satthari ceva there ca gāravena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0305a0:453_4: rattiṃ nava vāreti ekāhaṃ aṭṭhārasa vāre upaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0305a0:453_5: Divasassa pana satavāraṃ vā sahassavāraṃ vā gantukāmo samānopi na akāraṇā gacchati,
atk-s0305a0:453_7: So taṃdivasaṃ tena kathāpābhatena gantukāmo evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:454_0: Satthā hatthaṃ pasāretvā dhātuparissāvanaṃ gahetvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “yo so,
atk-s0305a0:454_2: bhikkhu purimadivase anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni katvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpesi,
atk-s0305a0:454_3: tassa idāni imā saṅkhavaṇṇasannibhā dhātuyova paññāyanti,
atk-s0305a0:454_6: mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anupavattako esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a0:454_9: ṭhapetvā maṃ dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu paññāya asadiso esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a0:454_11: puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a0:454_13: santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo codako pāpagarahī esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a0:454_14: pañca jātisatāni paṭiladdhamahāsampattiyo pahāya pabbajito esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a0:454_21: puthupaññassa hāsapaññassa javanapaññassa tikkhapaññassa nibbedhikapaññassa appicchassa santuṭṭhassa pavivittassa asaṃsaṭṭhassa āraddhavīriyassa,
atk-s0305a0:471_0: Iti bhagavā pañcahi gāthāsatehi therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0305a0:471_1: Yathā yathā bhagavā therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0305a0:471_2: tathā tathā ānandatthero sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:471_8: Tassa hi uddesaparipucchādhamme agahite vā gahetuṃ,
atk-s0305a0:471_9: gahite vā sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ cittaṃ na pavattati.
atk-s0305a0:471_10: Atha satthā pañcapasādavicitrāni akkhīni ummīletvā theraṃ olokento “assāsessāmi na”nti assāsento kiṃ nu kho te, ānanda,
atk-s0305a0:472_8: Sandassakoti khandhadhātuāyatanavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ dassetā.
atk-s0305a0:473_0: Akilāsu dhammadesanāyāti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhitvā “sīsaṃ vā me rujjati,
atk-s0305a0:473_1: hadayaṃ vā kucchi vā piṭṭhi vā”ti evaṃ osakkanākāravirahito nikkilāsu visārado ekassāpi dvinnampi sīhavegeneva pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a0:473_2: Anuggāhako sabrahmacārīnanti padassa attho khandhakavagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0305a0:474_0: Satthā “ativiya ayaṃ bhikkhu kilamatī”ti puna taṃ assāsento nanu taṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0305a0:474_2: Tattha piyehi manāpehīti mātāpitābhātābhaginīādikehi jātiyā nānābhāvo,
atk-s0305a0:474_8: tasmā dasa pāramiyo pūretvāpi sambodhiṃ patvāpi dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvāpi yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvāpi
atk-s0305a0:474_9: devorohanaṃ katvāpi yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:474_10: taṃ tathāgatassāpi sarīraṃ mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0305a0:474_11: rodantenapi kandantenapi na sakkā taṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhunti.
atk-s0305a0:475_0: Evameva khoti ettha yojanasatubbedho mahājamburukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho tassa dakkhiṇadisaṃ gato paññāsayojaniko mahākhandho viya dhammasenāpati.
atk-s0305a0:475_1: Tasmiṃ mahākhandhe bhinne tato paṭṭhāya anupubbena vaḍḍhitvā pupphaphalādīhi taṃ ṭhānaṃ pūretuṃ samatthassa
atk-s0305a0:475_2: aññassa khandhassa abhāvo viya there parinibbute soḷasannaṃ paññānaṃ matthakaṃ pattassa aññassa dakkhiṇāsane
atk-s0305a0:475_4: Tāya paribhinnāya so rukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho khandhotveva jātoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:475_6: taṃ mā palujjīti na sakkā laddhuṃ, tasmā.
atk-s0305a0:477_1: Catutthe aciraparinibbutesu sāriputtamoggallānesūti naciraparinibbutesu dvīsu aggasāvakesu.
atk-s0305a0:477_4: Satthā dvīsu aggasāvakesu parinibbutesu mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mahāmaṇḍale cārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena
atk-s0305a0:477_5: ukkacelanagaraṃ patvā tattha piṇḍāya caritvā gaṅgāpiṭṭhe rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālikāpuline vihāsi.
atk-s0305a0:477_7: Ye mahantatarā khandhā te palujjeyyunti idhāpi yojanasatubbedho mahājamburukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho,
atk-s0305a0:477_8: tassa dakkhiṇato ca uttarato ca gatā paṇṇāsayojanikā dve mahākhandhā viya dve aggasāvakāti.
atk-s0305a0:479_0: 382. Chaṭṭhe maccudheyyassa pāranti tebhūmakavaṭṭassa pārabhūtaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:481_1: Aṭṭhame kāye vā bhikkhūti tasmiṃ kāle bhikkhuyeva natthi,
atk-s0305a0:481_5: Jātikkhayantadassīti jātiyā khayoti ca antoti ca nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:481_7: Maggaṃ pajānātīti ekāyanasaṅkhātaṃ ekamaggabhūtaṃ maggaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0305a0:483_4: ahaṃ taṃ rakkhissāmīti ettha ayaṃ tassa laddhi –
atk-s0305a0:483_7: sabbakālañca vaṃsaggaṃ anullokento antevāsikaṃ na rakkhati nāma,
atk-s0305a0:483_8: evaṃ arakkhito antevāsiko patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:483_11: sabbakālañca vaṃsaggaṃ ullokento taṃ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:483_12: Antevāsikopi ito cito ca pakkhanditvā migo viya kīḷanto ācariyaṃ na rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:483_13: Evañhi sati tikhiṇavaṃsakoṭi ācariyassa galavāṭake vā nalāṭe vā ṭhapitā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ bhinditvā gaccheyya.
atk-s0305a0:483_15: tato anāmento taṃ ākaḍḍhento viya ekatobhāgiyaṃ katvā vātūpathambhaṃ gāhāpetvā satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā niccalova nisīdanto ācariyaṃ rakkhati nāmāti.
atk-s0305a0:484_7: Antevāsikopi kāyampi ekatobhāgiyaṃ katvā vātūpathambhaṃ gāhāpetvā satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā niccalova nisīdamāno attānaṃyeva rakkhati nāma,
atk-s0305a0:485_0: So tattha ñāyoti yaṃ medakathālikā āha.
atk-s0305a0:485_6: attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhatīti yo bhikkhu kammārāmatādīni pahāya rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ āsevanto bhāvento arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:485_9: sammāpaṭipanno”ti tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā saggaparāyaṇo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:485_10: Ayaṃ attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:486_5: Paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatīti ettha yo bhikkhu rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ gato tīsu brahmavihāresu tikacatukkajjhānāni
atk-s0305a0:486_6: nibbattetvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a0:486_7: Ayaṃ paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:488_1: Dasame janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā.
atk-s0305a0:488_12: vayakalyāṇanti imehi pana kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā pañcakalyāṇehi samannāgatā nāma.
atk-s0305a0:488_18: Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:488_20: Vīsati pana nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya,
atk-s0305a0:488_23: Dvattiṃsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti viya khāyanti,
atk-s0305a0:488_25: Vīsativassasatikāpi pana samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti nippalitā,
atk-s0305a0:489_5: Nacce ca gīte ca uttamapavatti seṭṭhakiriyā,
atk-s0305a0:489_9: Imesu pana dvīsu suttesu pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitāti.
atk-s0305a0:495_1: Tatiye parihānaṃ hotīti puggalavasena parihānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:495_2: Yo hi buddhesu dharantesupi cattāro satipaṭṭhāne na bhāveti,
atk-s0305a0:495_3: tassa saddhammo antarahito nāma hoti devadattādīnaṃ viya.
atk-s0305a0:495_4: Iti imasmiṃ sutte tassa puggalasseva dhammantaradhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:497_2: Cattāro hi magge tīṇi ca phalāni nibbattentena satipaṭṭhānā padesaṃ bhāvitā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:499_2: Arahattaphalaṃ uppādentena hi satipaṭṭhānā samattaṃ bhāvitā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:501_1: Aṭṭhame mahābhiññatanti channaṃ abhiññānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:501_3: Thero kira pātova uṭṭhāya mukhaṃ dhovitvā senāsane nisinno atīte kappasahassaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:501_5: paccuppannepi sahassaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ tassāvajjanassa gatiṃ anubandhati.
atk-s0305a0:501_6: Iti so dibbena cakkhunā sahassaṃ lokaṃ abhijānāti,
atk-s0305a0:504_1: Catutthavaggassa pañcame viditā vedanāti yā vedanā sammasitvā arahattaṃ patto tāvassa viditā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:504_4: Yā ca pana pariggahitesu vatthārammaṇesu pavattā vedanā,
atk-s0305a0:508_1: Pañcamavaggassa dutiye āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayoti āhārasamudayena kāyasamudayo.
atk-s0305a0:508_3: Manasikārasamudayāti ettha pana yonisomanasikārasamudayā bojjhaṅgadhammānaṃ samudayo,
atk-s0305a0:510_0: 410. Catutthaṃ suddhikaṃ katvā samudaye kathite bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:512_1: Chaṭṭhe pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti catunnaṃ sīlānaṃ jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:512_4: itarāni tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:512_15: sesāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhitumpi sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:513_0: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno.
atk-s0305a0:513_5: Sikkhassu sikkhāpadesūti sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkha,
atk-s0305a0:513_6: yaṃ yaṃ pana kiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā,
atk-s0305a0:513_7: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ sammā ādāya sikkhassūti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0305a0:515_2: manosucaritaṃ itarāni tīṇi sīlānīti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:515_3: Iminā nayena pañcasattanavadasasu kusalakammapathesu pacchimāpi tayo sīlaṃ hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0305a0:519_1: Indriyasaṃyuttassa paṭhame saddhindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ paññindriyanti imāni tīṇi catubhūmakakusalavipākesu ceva kiriyāsu ca labbhanti.
atk-s0305a0:519_2: Vīriyindriyasamādhindriyāni catubhūmakakusale akusale vipāke kiriyāyāti sabbattha labbhanti.
atk-s0305a0:521_1: Sattame saddhindriyaṃ nappajānantīti dukkhasaccavasena na pajānanti.
atk-s0305a0:522_0: Sukkapakkhe pana adhimokkhavasena āvajjanasamudayā saddhindriyasamudayo hoti,
atk-s0305a0:522_8: Manasikāravasena āvajjanasamudayā vīriyasatisamādhipaññindriyasamudayo hotīti evampi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:522_9: Imesu paṭipāṭiyā chasu suttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:524_4: catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesūtiādi imesaṃ indriyānaṃ savisaye jeṭṭhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:524_5: Yathā hi cattāro seṭṭhiputtā rājāti rājapañcamesu sahāyesu “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu ekassa
atk-s0305a0:524_6: seṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a0:524_12: catutthassa gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a0:524_16: Atha sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle kiñcāpi rājā sabbattha issaro,
atk-s0305a0:524_20: Evameva saddhāpañcamakesu indriyesu tesu sahāyesu ekato vīthiṃ otarantesu viya ekārammaṇe uppajjamānesupi
atk-s0305a0:524_21: yathā paṭhamassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a0:524_23: evaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:524_25: Yathā dutiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a0:524_27: evaṃ sammappadhānāni patvā paggahalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:524_29: Yathā tatiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a0:524_31: evaṃ satipaṭṭhānāni patvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:524_33: Yathā catutthassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a0:524_35: evaṃ jhānavimokkhe patvā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:524_37: Sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle pana yathā itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a0:524_39: evameva ariyasaccāni patvā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ paññindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:526_1: Navame satinepakkenāti ettha nipakassa bhāvo nepakkaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:526_8: Cirakatanti cirakālaṃ kataṃ dānaṃ vā sīlaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā.
atk-s0305a0:526_9: Cirabhāsitanti “asukasmiṃ ṭhāne asukaṃ nāma bhāsita”nti evaṃ cirakāle bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:530_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame sammappadhāne ārabbhāti sammappadhāne paṭicca,
atk-s0305a0:532_2: Samattāni hi paripuṇṇāni pañcindriyāni arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:532_3: Tato mudutarehīti tehi arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni anāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti,
atk-s0305a0:532_5: tato mudutarāni sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti,
atk-s0305a0:532_7: tato mudutarāni saddhānusārimaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:533_0: Tathā samattāni paripuṇṇāni pañcindriyāni arahattamaggindriyāni nāma honti,
atk-s0305a0:534_0: Samattāni paripuṇṇāni pañcindriyāni arahattaphalindriyāni nāma honti,
atk-s0305a0:534_5: maggaṭṭhapuggalavasena nesaṃ nānattaṃ jātanti āgamanenapi maggenapi.
atk-s0305a0:534_6: Saddhānusārī puggalo hi uddisāpento paripucchanto anupubbena maggaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:534_7: dhammānusārī ekena vā dvīhi vā savanehi.
atk-s0305a0:534_8: Evaṃ tāva nesaṃ āgamanena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:535_2: asaṅkhārena appayogena kilese chindati kadalikkhandhaṃ viya tikhiṇā asidhārā.
atk-s0305a0:535_3: Saddhānusārissa na tassa viya maggo tikkho hoti,
atk-s0305a0:535_5: sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese chindati kadalikkhandhaṃ viya atikhiṇā asidhārā.
atk-s0305a0:537_2: Samattāni hi paripuṇṇāni pañcindriyāni arahattaphalindriyāni nāma honti,
atk-s0305a0:537_3: arahattaphalena samannāgato puggalo arahā nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:537_7: sotāpattiphalena samannāgato puggalo sotāpanno nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:539_1: Catutthe paripūraṃ paripūrakārī ārādhetīti paripūraṃ arahattamaggaṃ karonto arahattaphalaṃ ārādheti.
atk-s0305a0:539_2: Padesaṃ padesakārīti avasese tayo padesamagge karonto padesaṃ phalattayamattameva ārādheti.
atk-s0305a0:539_3: Iti imesu catūsupi suttesu missakāneva indriyāni kathitāni.
atk-s0305a0:541_1: Pañcame tato mudutarehīti vipassanāvasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:541_2: Paripuṇṇāni hi pañcindriyāni arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyāni honti,
atk-s0305a0:541_7: tato mudutarāni uddhaṃsotaakaniṭṭhagāmissa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a0:542_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne arahattamaggeyeva ṭhatvā pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni.
atk-s0305a0:542_1: Arahattamaggassa hi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni paṭhamaantarāparinibbāyissa vipassanindriyāni,
atk-s0305a0:543_5: Imesu pana tīsupi suttesu pubbabhāgavipassanindriyāneva kathitāni.
atk-s0305a0:545_1: Aṭṭhame tato mudutarehīti maggaphalavasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:551_1: Tatiyavaggassa dutiye itthindriyantiādīsu itthibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ karotīti itthindriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:551_5: Saṅghamajjhasmiñhi “kati nu kho vaṭṭindriyānī”ti kathā udapādi,
atk-s0305a0:551_6: atha bhagavā vaṭṭindriyāni dassento tīṇimāni bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:553_1: Tatiye anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti “anamatagge saṃsāre ajānitapubbaṃ dhammaṃ jānissāmī”ti paṭipannassa sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:553_2: Aññindriyanti tesaṃyeva ñātadhammānaṃ ājānanākārena sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:553_4: Tattha tattha tena tenākārena uppannassa ñāṇassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:553_6: Saṅghamajjhasmiñhi “kati nu kho lokuttarindriyānī”ti kathā udapādi,
atk-s0305a0:555_1: Catutthe tato mudutarehīti vipassanato nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:555_2: Samattāni hi pañcindriyāni arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti,
atk-s0305a0:555_8: Idhāpi purimanayeneva arahattamagge ṭhatvā pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni.
atk-s0305a0:556_0: Yathā pana purimanaye sakadāgāmimagge ṭhatvā tīṇi nissakkāni,
atk-s0305a0:556_2: Sakadāgāmimaggassa hi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni,
atk-s0305a0:556_3: sotāpattimaggassa ca tehi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni ekabījiādīnaṃ maggassa vipassanindriyāni.
atk-s0305a0:557_0: Ettha ca ekabījītiādīsu yo sotāpanno hutvā ekameva attabhāvaṃ janetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:557_3: idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
atk-s0305a0:557_4: so ekaññeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a0:558_0: Yo pana dve tayo bhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a0:558_3: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
atk-s0305a0:558_4: so dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a0:558_8: yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsaranto pana kolaṃkolova hoti.
atk-s0305a0:559_4: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
atk-s0305a0:559_5: so sattakkhattuṃ deve ca manusse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a0:560_3: ettakaṃ sattakkhattuparamo”ti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:561_0: Ko pana nesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti?
atk-s0305a0:561_5: Tattha “pubbahetu niyametī”ti vāde paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a0:561_6: upari tayo maggā anupanissayā uppannāti vacanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0305a0:561_7: “Paṭhamamaggo niyametī”ti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati.
atk-s0305a0:561_8: “Upari tayo maggā niyamentī”ti vāde paṭhamamagge anuppanneva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjati.
atk-s0305a0:561_9: “Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyametī”ti vādo pana yujjati.
atk-s0305a0:561_10: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0305a0:562_0: Ekacco hi sotāpanno vaṭṭajjhāsayo hoti vaṭṭābhirato punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarati sandissati.
atk-s0305a0:562_6: nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
atk-s0305a0:562_9: yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:562_10: yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:562_13: kālena manusse saṃsaritvā pana arahattaṃ pāpuṇantova idha gahito.
atk-s0305a0:562_14: Tasmā sattakkhattuparamoti idaṃ idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇasukkhavipassakassa nāmaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:563_0: Dhammānusārī saddhānusārīti ettha pana imasmiṃ sāsane lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattentassa dve dhurāni,
atk-s0305a0:563_9: Tattha yo bhikkhu “sace saddhāya sakkā nibbattetuṃ,
atk-s0305a0:563_10: nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
atk-s0305a0:563_12: Phalakkhaṇe pana saddhāvimutto nāma hutvā ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti tividho hoti.
atk-s0305a0:563_13: Tattha ekeko dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena catubbidhabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti saddhādhurena dvādasa janā honti.
atk-s0305a0:564_1: nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
atk-s0305a0:564_3: Phalakkhaṇe pana paññāvimutto nāma hutvā ekabījiādibhedena dvādasabhedova hoti.
atk-s0305a0:564_4: Evaṃ dve maggaṭṭhā phalakkhaṇe catuvīsati sotāpannā hontīti.
atk-s0305a0:565_0: Tipiṭakatissatthero kira “tīṇi piṭakāni sodhessāmī”ti paratīraṃ gato.
atk-s0305a0:565_1: Taṃ eko kuṭumbiko catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0305a0:565_7: bhaddantaṃ pana nissāya mayā sāsanassa guṇo ñāto,
atk-s0305a0:565_10: “yo bhikkhu catuvīsati sotāpanne dvādasa sakadāgāmī aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmī dvādasa arahante dassetvā dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:567_1: Pañcame cakkhu ca taṃ cakkhudvāre nibbattānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādhipateyyasaṅkhātena indaṭṭhena indriyañcāti cakkhundriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:567_4: Imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamasuttañceva chaṭṭhādīni ca pañcāti cha suttāni catusaccavasena kathitānīti.
atk-s0305a0:571_1: Catutthavaggassa paṭhame sukhañca taṃ sahajātānaṃ ādhipateyyasaṅkhātena indaṭṭhena indriyañcāti sukhindriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:573_9: Kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vāti ettha pana cakkhādayo cattāro pasādakāye vatthuṃ katvā uppattivasena kāyikanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:577_1: Dasamaṃ yathādhammarasena paṭipāṭiyā vuttampi imasmiṃ indriyavibhaṅge sesasuttāni viya adesitattā uppaṭipāṭikasuttaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:577_4: Dukkhindriyasamudayanti kaṇṭakena vā viddhassa maṅkulena vā daṭṭhassa paccattharaṇe vā valiyā phuṭṭhassa dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:578_0: Parato domanassindriyasamudayantiādīsupi tesaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇavaseneva samudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:578_1: Pattacīvarādīnaṃ vā hi saṅkhārānaṃ saddhivihārikādīnaṃ vā sattānaṃ vināsena domanassindriyaṃ uppajjatīti tesaṃ vināsaṃ tassa samudayoti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a0:578_2: Subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā varasayane nipannassa hatthapādasambāhanatālavaṇṭavātādisamphassena sukhindriyaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:578_4: Vuttappakārānaṃ pana sattasaṅkhārānaṃ manāpānaṃ paṭilābhavasena somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:578_7: taṃ sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattākāraṃ tassa samudayoti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a0:579_0: Kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha,
atk-s0305a0:579_2: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehītiādīsu pana ayaṃ ekatova vinicchayakathā –
atk-s0305a0:579_3: dukkhindriyañhi paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati pahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:579_5: Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ atisayanirodhattā ayaṃ jhānesuyeva nirodho vutto.
atk-s0305a0:579_10: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti,
atk-s0305a0:579_12: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti paṭipakkhena avihatattā.
atk-s0305a0:579_13: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti,
atk-s0305a0:579_14: sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ paṭipakkhena vihatattā.
atk-s0305a0:579_15: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati,
atk-s0305a0:579_19: appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti.
atk-s0305a0:579_21: Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhakāyassa siyā uppatti,
atk-s0305a0:579_23: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhā.
atk-s0305a0:579_24: Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti,
atk-s0305a0:579_26: Tasmā “ettha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0305a0:580_0: Yaṃ panettha tadatthāya cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:580_1: tattha alābhī samāno uppādanatthāya cittaṃ upasaṃharati,
atk-s0305a0:584_1: Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame pacchātapeti pāsādacchāyāya puratthimadisaṃ paṭicchannattā pāsādassa pacchimadisābhāge ātapo hoti,
atk-s0305a0:584_3: Piṭṭhiṃ otāpayamānoti yasmā sammāsambuddhassapi upādinnakasarīre uṇhakāle uṇhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:584_6: Tasmā mahācīvaraṃ otāretvā sūriyarasmīhi piṭṭhiṃ otāpayamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0305a0:585_0: Kiṃ pana buddharasmiyo madditvā sūriyarasmi anto pavisituṃ sakkotīti?
atk-s0305a0:585_4: Yatheva hi ṭhitamajjhanhike parimaṇḍalāya chāyāya rukkhamūle nisinnassa kiñcāpi sūriyarasmiyo sarīraṃ na phusanti,
atk-s0305a0:585_7: evaṃ sūriyarasmīsu buddharasmiyo madditvā anto pavisituṃ asakkuṇantīsupi satthā tejaṃ tāpento nisinnoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:586_1: Acchariyaṃ bhanteti thero bhagavato piṭṭhito mahācīvaraṃ otāretvā nisinnassa dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ antare
atk-s0305a0:586_3: “evarūpepi nāma sarīre jarā paññāyatī”ti sañjātasaṃvego jaraṃ garahanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:587_1: bhagavato tāva parisuddhoti yathā pakatiyā chavivaṇṇo parisuddho,
atk-s0305a0:587_3: Tathāgatassa hi daharakāle saṅkusatasamabbhāhataṃ usabhacammaṃ viya vihatavaliko kāyo hoti,
atk-s0305a0:587_9: maṃsaṃ aṭṭhito muccitvā sithilabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tattha tattha olambati.
atk-s0305a0:588_0: Sithilāni ca gattānīti aññesaṃ mukhe aṃsakūṭantarehi tesu tesu ṭhānesu valiyo santiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0305a0:588_2: thero ca dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ antare valiyāvaṭṭakaṃ disvā evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:588_3: Sabbāni valiyajātānīti idampi attano pākaṭavasena evamāha –
atk-s0305a0:588_4: satthu pana aññesaṃ viya valiyo nāma natthi.
atk-s0305a0:588_5: Purato pabbhāro ca kāyoti satthā brahmujugatto,
atk-s0305a0:588_6: devanagare samussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viyassa kāyo ujukameva uggato.
atk-s0305a0:588_7: Mahallakakāle pana kāyo purato vaṅko hoti,
atk-s0305a0:588_11: Dissati ca indriyānaṃ aññathattanti indriyāni nāma na cakkhuviññeyyāni.
atk-s0305a0:588_16: imināva kāraṇena cakkhādīnañca indriyānaṃ aññathattena bhavitabbanti nayaggāhato evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:588_17: Dhī taṃ jammi jare atthūti lāmake jare dhī taṃ tuyhaṃ hotu,
atk-s0305a0:590_3: sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekaṃ ekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhoti.
atk-s0305a0:590_4: Sace hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya –
atk-s0305a0:590_5: “iṅgha tvaṃ tāva naṃ vavatthapehi vibhāvehi ‘kinnāmetaṃ ārammaṇa”’nti.
atk-s0305a0:590_6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vināpi mukhena attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya – “are,
atk-s0305a0:590_8: vassasatampi vassasahassampi vassasatasahassampi paridhāvamāno aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0305a0:590_17: Evametāni aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma.
atk-s0305a0:591_3: Manova nesanti manodvārikajavanamanova etesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ rajjanādivasena anubhoti.
atk-s0305a0:591_5: ettha rajjanaṃ vā dussanaṃ vā muyhanaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0305a0:591_6: Ekasmiṃ pana dvāre javanaṃ rajjati vā dussati vā muyhati vā.
atk-s0305a0:592_1: pañca kira dubbalabhojakā rājānaṃ sevitvā kicchena kasirena ekasmiṃ pañcakulike gāme parittakaṃ āyaṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:592_3: addukahāpaṇo vā yottakahāpaṇo vā māsakahāpaṇo vā aṭṭhakahāpaṇo vā soḷasakahāpaṇo vā catusaṭṭhikahāpaṇo vā daṇḍoti ettakamattameva pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a0:592_4: satavatthukaṃ pañcasatavatthukaṃ sahassavatthukaṃ mahābaliṃ rājāva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0305a0:593_5: Rañño mahābaliggahaṇaṃ viya tesu dvāresu javanassa rajjanādīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0305a0:594_5: Nāsakkhi pañhassa pariyantaṃ gahetunti pañhassa paricchedaṃ pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0305a0:594_11: Nibbānaparāyaṇanti nibbānaṃ paraṃ ayanamassa parā gati,
atk-s0305a0:595_5: Tasmiñhi samaye brāhmaṇassa paṭhamamaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīnāni,
atk-s0305a0:595_7: So aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā tattheva parinibbāyeyya.
atk-s0305a0:595_8: Sace panassa puttadāraṃ anusāsantassa kammante vicārentassa jhānaṃ nassati,
atk-s0305a0:595_10: anaṭṭhe pana nibaddhāti imaṃ jhānaanāgāmitaṃ sandhāya evamāha.

atk-s0305a0:664_5: So puna apāyabhayena cittaṃ tajjetvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karotīti evamassa kosajjena vokiṇṇattā chando kosajjasahagato nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:665_0: Uddhaccasahagatoti idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto nisīdati.
atk-s0305a0:665_2: So buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā tosetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā puna chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0305a0:665_4: So puna buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā tosetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a0:665_5: manasi karotīti evamassa uddhaccena vokiṇṇattā chando uddhaccasahagato nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:666_0: Thinamiddhasahagatoti idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto nisīdati.
atk-s0305a0:666_2: So “uppannaṃ me thinamiddha”nti ñatvā udakena mukhaṃ puñchitvā,
atk-s0305a0:666_3: kaṇṇe ākaḍḍhitvā paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ sajjhāyitvā divā gahitaṃ vā ālokasaññaṃ manasikaritvā thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0305a0:666_4: puna chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0305a0:666_6: So vuttanayeneva puna thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karotīti evamassa
atk-s0305a0:666_7: thinamiddhena vokiṇṇattā chando thinamiddhasahagato nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:667_0: Anuvikkhittoti idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto nisīdati.
atk-s0305a0:667_2: So “bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ me citta”nti ñatvā anamatagga devadūta-
atk-s0305a0:667_3: celopama anāgatabhayasuttādīni āvajjento suttadaṇḍena cittaṃ tajjetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā puna chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0305a0:667_5: So puna suttadaṇḍena cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karotīti evamassa
atk-s0305a0:667_6: kāmavitakkavokiṇṇattā chando bahiddhā pañca kāmaguṇe ārabbha anuvikkhitto anuvisaṭo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:668_0: Yathā pure tathā pacchāti kammaṭṭhānavasenapi desanāvasenapi purimapacchimatā veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0305a0:668_1: Kammaṭṭhāne tāva kammaṭṭhānassa abhiniveso pure nāma,
atk-s0305a0:668_3: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā atilīnādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu cittassa okkamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā,
atk-s0305a0:668_4: duṭṭhagoṇe yojetvā sārento viya caturassaghaṭikaṃ otārento viya catunnaṃ ṭhānānaṃ ekaṭṭhānepi asajjanto saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a0:668_5: Ayampi yathā pure tathā pacchā viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:668_9: Tattha yo bhikkhu kesesu abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto catūsu ṭhānesu asajjanto yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0305a0:668_10: ayampi yathā pure tathā pacchā viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:668_12: Yathā pacchā tathā pureti idaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:669_0: Yathā adho tathā uddhanti idaṃ sarīravasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:669_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu pādatalato paṭṭhāya yāva kesamatthakā dvattiṃsākāravasena vā pādaṅguliaggapabbaṭṭhito yāva sīsakaṭāhaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:669_4: tāva aṭṭhivasena vā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti catūsu ṭhānesu ekaṭṭhānepi asajjanto.
atk-s0305a0:669_6: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:670_3: Ālokasaññā suggahitā hotīti yo bhikkhu aṅgaṇe nisīditvā ālokasaññaṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0305a0:670_6: Athassa yadā nimīlentassāpi ummīletvā olokentassa viya ekasadisameva upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0305a0:670_9: Sā ca pana rattiṃ uppajjamānā suggahitā nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:670_11: Suṭṭhu adhiṭṭhitā suṭṭhu ṭhapitā svādhiṭṭhitā nāma vuccati.
atk-s0305a0:670_13: Yo vā ālokena thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0305a0:670_14: tassa divāpi ālokasaññā suggahitā svādhiṭṭhitā nāma.
atk-s0305a0:670_15: Ratti vā hotu divā vā yena ālokena thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0305a0:670_16: tasmiṃ thinamiddhavinodane āloke uppannā saññā suggahitāyeva nāma.
atk-s0305a0:670_18: Imasmiṃ sutte channaṃ abhiññānaṃ pādakiddhi kathitā.
atk-s0305a0:674_1: Tatiyavaggassa dutiye iminā cātumahābhūtikenāti iminā catumahābhūtamayena evaṃ bhārikena garukena samānenāpi.
atk-s0305a0:674_4: Kāyampi citte samodahatīti kāyaṃ gahetvā citte āropeti,
atk-s0305a0:674_9: Cittampi kāye samodahatīti cittaṃ gahetvā kāye āropeti,
atk-s0305a0:674_15: Sā hi santasukhasamannāgatattā sukhasaññā nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a0:675_0: Ayoguḷo divasaṃ santatto lahutaro ceva hotīti so hi dvīhi tīhi janehi ukkhipitvā kammāruddhane pakkhittopi
atk-s0305a0:675_1: divasaṃ paccamāno vivarānupaviṭṭhena tejena ceva vāyena ca vāyosahagato ca usmāsahagato ca tejosahagato
atk-s0305a0:675_3: yathā naṃ kammāro mahāsaṇḍāsena gahetvā ekato parivatteti ukkhipati bahi nīharati.
atk-s0305a0:675_4: Evaṃ pana mudu ca hoti kammaniyo ca.
atk-s0305a0:675_5: Yathā naṃ so khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ vicchindati,
atk-s0305a0:677_3: Apica dve phalāni ādiṃ katvā heṭṭhā missakiddhipādā kathitā,
atk-s0305a0:679_0: 843-844. Ekādasamadvādasamesu cha abhiññā kathitā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a0:682_2: Saṅkhepato panettha chattiṃsāya ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā,
atk-s0305a0:682_3: dutiye dvādasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0305a0:684_0: 901. Tatiye mahābhiññatanti chaabhiññābhāvaṃ. Hīnaṃ dhammantiādīsu imāya pāḷiyā attho veditabbo –
atk-s0305a0:687_2: Chaṭṭhe sahassaṃ lokanti iminā therassa satata vihāro dassito.
atk-s0305a0:687_3: Thero hi pātova mukhaṃ dhovitvā atītānāgate kappasahassaṃ anussarati.
atk-s0305a0:689_2: salaḷarukkhassa vā dvāre ṭhitattā evaṃnāmake agāre.
atk-s0305a0:689_3: Imasmiṃ sutte vipassanāya saddhiṃ vipassakapuggalo kathito.
atk-s0305a0:691_1: Navame āsabhiṃ vācanti attano arahattabhāvadīpakaṃ uttamavācaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:694_1: Dutiyavagge ṭhānañca ṭhānatotiādīhi thero dasabalañāṇaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0305a0:698_3: taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaniddese vuttameva.
atk-s0305a0:700_3: Ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca dhammesūti ajjhattikabāhiresu dvādasasu āyatanadhammesu.
atk-s0305a0:700_7: Idāni arahattamaggassa vipassanaṃ dassento so satova assasissāmītiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:702_0: 983. Sattame iñjitattaṃ vā phanditattaṃ vāti ubhayenapi calanameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:704_1: Aṭṭhame neva kāyopi kilamati na cakkhūnīti aññesu hi kammaṭṭhānesu kammaṃ karontassa kāyopi kilamati,
atk-s0305a0:704_5: Kasiṇakammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karontassa cakkhūni phandanti kilamanti,
atk-s0305a0:704_7: Imasmiṃ pana kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karontassa neva kāyo kilamati,
atk-s0305a0:705_6: Alabbhante ayaṃ ariyiddhiādiko pabhedo kasmā gahitoti?
atk-s0305a0:705_8: Ariyaṃ vā hi iddhiṃ cattāri vā rūpāvacarajjhānāni catasso vā arūpasamāpattiyo nirodhasamāpattiṃ vā patthayamānena
atk-s0305a0:705_10: Yathā hi nagare laddhe yaṃ catūsu disāsu uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:705_14: Evaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanāya ānisaṃso esa ariyiddhiādiko pabhedo,
atk-s0305a0:705_15: sabbākārena bhāvite ānāpānassatisamādhismiṃ sabbametaṃ yogino nipphajjatīti ānisaṃsadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:705_16: Sukhañceti ettha soti kasmā na vuttaṃ?
atk-s0305a0:707_1: Navame vesāliyanti evaṃnāmake itthiliṅgavasena pavattavohāre nagare.
atk-s0305a0:707_2: Tañhi nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanena visālībhūtattā vesālīti vuccati.
atk-s0305a0:707_3: Idampi ca nagaraṃ sabbaññutaṃ patteyeva sammāsambuddhe sabbākāravepullataṃ pattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:707_4: Evaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā nivāsaṭṭhānamāha mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti.
atk-s0305a0:707_5: Tattha mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:707_6: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:707_9: Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā sabbākārasampannā
atk-s0305a0:708_0: Anekapariyāyena asubhakathaṃ kathetīti anekehi kāraṇehi asubhākārasandassanappavattaṃ kāyavicchandanīyakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0305a0:708_2: atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā…pe… muttanti.
atk-s0305a0:708_5: imasmiṃ byāmamatte kaḷevare sabbākārenapi vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ
atk-s0305a0:708_6: vā candanaṃ vā kuṅkumaṃ vā kappuraṃ vā vāsacuṇṇādiṃ vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati,
atk-s0305a0:708_7: atha kho paramaduggandhaṃ jegucchaassirikadassanaṃ kesalomādinānappakāraṃ asucimeva passati,
atk-s0305a0:708_8: tasmā na ettha chando vā rāgo vā karaṇīyo.
atk-s0305a0:708_9: Yepi uttamaṅge sirasi jātā kesā nāma,
atk-s0305a0:708_10: tepi asubhā ceva asucino ca paṭikūlā ca.
atk-s0305a0:708_11: So ca nesaṃ asubhāsucipaṭikūlabhāvo vaṇṇatopi saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopīti pañcahākārehi veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:708_14: Iti bhagavā ekamekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse pañcapañcappabhedena anekapariyāyena asubhakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0305a0:709_0: Asubhāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti uddhumātakādivasena asubhamātikaṃ nikkhipitvā padabhājanīyena taṃ vibhajanto vaṇṇento asubhāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0305a0:709_1: Asubhabhāvanāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti yā ayaṃ kesādīsu vā uddhumātakādīsu vā ajjhattabahiddhāvatthūsu asubhākāraṃ
atk-s0305a0:709_2: gahetvā pavattassa cittassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā phātikammaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:709_3: tassā asubhabhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassento vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0305a0:709_8: bhikkhu kesādīsu vā vatthūsu uddhumātakādīsu vā pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a0:709_10: So taṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ cittamañjūsaṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:710_4: ekaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyituṃ nilīyituṃ ekakova hutvā viharituṃ icchāmīti attho.
atk-s0305a0:710_5: Nāmhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenāti yo attanā payuttavācaṃ akatvā mamatthāya
atk-s0305a0:710_6: saddhesu kulesu paṭiyattapiṇḍapātaṃ nīharitvā mayhaṃ upanāmeti,
atk-s0305a0:710_7: taṃ piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā nāmhi aññena kenaci bhikkhunā vā gahaṭṭhena vā upasaṅkamitabboti.
atk-s0305a0:711_1: Atīte kira pañcasatā migaluddakā mahatīhi daṇḍavāgurādīhi araññaṃ parikkhipitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ekatoyeva
atk-s0305a0:711_2: yāvajīvaṃ migapakkhighātakammena jīvikaṃ kappetvā niraye uppannā.
atk-s0305a0:711_3: Te tattha paccitvā pubbe katena kenacideva kusalakammena manussesu uppannā kalyāṇūpanissayavasena sabbepi
atk-s0305a0:711_5: Tesaṃ tato mūlākusalakammato avipakkavipākā aparāparacetanā tasmiṃ aḍḍhamāsabbhantare attūpakkamena ca parūpakkamena ca jīvitūpacchedāya okāsamakāsi.
atk-s0305a0:711_7: Kammavipāko ca nāma na sakkā kenaci paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0305a0:712_1: “ime attabhāve chandarāgena maraṇabhayabhītā na sakkhissanti gatiṃ visodhetuṃ,
atk-s0305a0:712_3: Taṃ sutvā attabhāve vigatacchandarāgatāya gativisodhanaṃ katvā sagge paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0305a0:712_4: evaṃ tesaṃ mama santike pabbajjā sātthikā bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:712_5: Tato tesaṃ anuggahāya asubhakathaṃ kathesi kammaṭṭhānasīsena,
atk-s0305a0:712_12: ayañca kammavipāko na sakkā mayā vā aññena vā paṭibāhituṃ,
atk-s0305a0:712_20: nāmhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenā”ti.
atk-s0305a0:713_3: “ayaṃ ‘sabbaññū ahaṃ saddhammavaracakkavattī’ti paṭijānamāno attanopi sāvake aññamaññaṃ ghātente nivāretuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a0:713_11: Nāssudhāti ettha assudhāti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇatthe vā nipāto,
atk-s0305a0:714_0: Anekehi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīhi kāraṇehi vokāro assāti anekākāravokāro.
atk-s0305a0:714_1: Anekākāravokiṇṇo anekākārena sammissoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ko so?
atk-s0305a0:714_5: Aṭṭīyamānāti tena kāyena aṭṭā dukkhitā honti.
atk-s0305a0:714_9: Na kevalañca te satthaṃ pariyesitvā attanā vā attānaṃ jīvitā voropenti,
atk-s0305a0:714_13: Ettha ca ariyā neva pāṇātipātaṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0305a0:715_0: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ jīvitakkhayappattabhāvaṃ ñatvā tato ekībhāvato
atk-s0305a0:715_1: vuṭṭhito jānantopi ajānanto viya kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0305a0:715_4: pubbe bahū bhikkhū ekato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0305a0:715_8: Idāni pana aḍḍhamāsamattassa accayena tanubhūto viya tanuko mando appako viraḷo viya jāto bhikkhusaṅgho.
atk-s0305a0:716_0: Athāyasmā ānando kammavipākena tesaṃ jīvitakkhayappattiṃ asallakkhento asubhakammaṭṭhānānuyogapaccayā pana sallakkhento tathā hi pana,
atk-s0305a0:716_1: bhante bhagavātiādiṃ vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ arahattappattiyā aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācanto, sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0305a0:716_11: tesu bhagavā bhikkhū samassāsetvā aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhatūti adhippāyo.
atk-s0305a0:717_0: Atha bhagavā tathā kātukāmo theraṃ uyyojento tenahānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:717_1: Tattha vesāliṃ upanissāyāti vesāliyaṃ upanissāya samantā gāvutepi aḍḍhayojanepi yāvatikā viharanti,
atk-s0305a0:717_3: Sabbe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannipātetvāti attanā gantuṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ gantvā aññattha daharabhikkhū
atk-s0305a0:717_4: pahiṇitvā muhutteneva anavasese bhikkhū upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ samūhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0305a0:718_3: Āmantetvā ca pana bhikkhūnaṃ arahattappattiyā pubbe ācikkhitaasubhakammaṭṭhānato aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ ācikkhanto ānāpānassatisamādhītiādimāha.
atk-s0305a0:718_4: Tattha ānāpānassatisamādhīti ānāpānapariggāhikāya satiyā saddhiṃ sampayutto samādhi,
atk-s0305a0:718_9: Santo ceva paṇīto cāti santo ceva paṇīto ceva.
atk-s0305a0:718_12: Ayañhi yathā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhavasena santañca paṇītañca,
atk-s0305a0:718_13: oḷārikārammaṇattā pana paṭikūlārammaṇattā ca ārammaṇavasena neva santaṃ na paṇītaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:718_14: na evaṃ kenaci pariyāyena asanto vā appaṇīto vā,
atk-s0305a0:718_15: apica kho ārammaṇasantatāyapi santo vūpasanto nibbuto,
atk-s0305a0:719_0: Asecanako ca sukho ca vihāroti ettha pana nāssa secananti asecanako,
atk-s0305a0:719_2: natthi ettha parikammena vā upacārena vā santatā,
atk-s0305a0:719_3: ādisamannāhārato pabhuti attano sabhāveneva santo ca paṇīto cāti attho.
atk-s0305a0:719_6: Evamayaṃ asecanako ca appitappitakkhaṇe kāyikacetasikasukhappaṭilābhāya saṃvattanato sukho ca vihāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:720_8: Ūhataṃ rajojallanti aṭṭha māse vātātapasukkhāya gomahiṃsādipādappahārasambhinnāya pathaviyā uddhaṃ hataṃ ūhataṃ ākāse samuṭṭhitaṃ rajañca reṇuñca.
atk-s0305a0:720_9: Mahā akālameghoti sabbaṃ nabhaṃ ajjhottharitvā uṭṭhito āsāḷhajuṇhapakkhe sakalaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ vassanakamegho.
atk-s0305a0:720_10: So hi asampatte vassakāle uppannattā akālameghoti idha adhippeto.
atk-s0305a0:720_11: Ṭhānaso antarādhāpeti vūpasametīti khaṇeneva adassanaṃ neti pathaviyaṃ sannisīdāpeti.
atk-s0305a0:722_4: yathānusandhiṃ gamessāmī”ti desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭento etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0305a0:722_5: Kāyaññataranti pathavīādīsu kāyesu aññataraṃ vadāmi vāyokāyaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0305a0:722_7: kabaḷīkāro āhāroti pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsā rūpakāyo nāma,
atk-s0305a0:722_8: tesu ānāpānaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatane saṅgahitattā kāyaññataraṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:722_10: Tasmātihāti yasmā catūsu kāyesu aññataraṃ vāyokāyaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:722_11: pañcavīsati koṭṭhāse vā rūpakāye aññataraṃ ānāpānaṃ anupassati,
atk-s0305a0:723_0: Sādhukaṃ manasikāranti pītipaṭisaṃveditādivasena uppannaṃ sundaraṃ manasikāraṃ.
atk-s0305a0:723_1: Kiṃ pana manasikāro sukhā vedanā hotīti? Na hoti,
atk-s0305a0:723_3: Yatheva hi “aniccasaññābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā”ti ettha saññānāmena paññā vuttā,
atk-s0305a0:723_5: Etasmiñhi catukke paṭhamapade pītisīsena vedanā vuttā,
atk-s0305a0:723_7: Cittasaṅkhārapadadvaye “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittappaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato
atk-s0305a0:723_8: “vitakkavicāre ṭhapetvā sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā cittasaṅkhāre saṅgahitā”ti vacanato cittasaṅkhāranāmena
atk-s0305a0:723_10: Taṃ sabbaṃ manasikāranāmena saṅgahetvā idha “sādhukaṃ manasikāra”nti āha.
atk-s0305a0:724_0: Evaṃ santepi yasmā esā vedanā ārammaṇaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0305a0:724_3: mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsupi hi taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanā vedayati,
atk-s0305a0:724_4: taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya “ahaṃ vedayāmī”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:724_5: taṃ sandhāya “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:725_4: tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
atk-s0305a0:725_6: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttapītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati,
atk-s0305a0:725_7: tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇappaṭivedhena asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
atk-s0305a0:725_8: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “‘dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0305a0:725_9: tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī’ti.
atk-s0305a0:726_0: Iti yatheva jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pītisukhacittasaṅkhārā paṭisaṃviditā honti,
atk-s0305a0:726_1: evaṃ imināpi jhānasampayuttena vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato vedanā paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
atk-s0305a0:726_2: Tasmā suvuttametaṃ “vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:727_2: yasmā “cittapaṭisaṃvedī assāsissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavatto bhikkhu kiñcāpi assāsapassāsanimittamārammaṇaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a0:727_3: tassa pana cittassa ārammaṇe satiñca sampajaññañca upaṭṭhāpetvā pavattanato citte cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti.
atk-s0305a0:727_4: Na hi muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā atthi,
atk-s0305a0:727_5: tasmā ārammaṇato cittapaṭisaṃviditavasena “citte cittānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:728_0: So yaṃ taṃ hoti abhijjhādomanassānaṃ pahānaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:728_1: taṃ paññāya disvā sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hotīti ettha abhijjhā kāmacchandanīvaraṇameva,
atk-s0305a0:728_7: Iti dhammānupassanāya ādiṃ dassetuṃ abhijjhādomanassānanti āha.
atk-s0305a0:728_8: Pahānanti aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pajahatīti evaṃ pahānakarañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:728_9: Taṃ paññāya disvāti taṃ aniccavirāganirodhapaṭinissaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ pahānañāṇaṃ aparāya vipassanāpaññāya,
atk-s0305a0:728_12: yañca ekato upaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhatīti dvidhā ajjhupekkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a0:728_15: Tasmātihānandāti yasmā “aniccānupassī assāsissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavatto na kevalaṃ nīvaraṇādidhamme,
atk-s0305a0:728_16: abhijjhādomanassasīsena pana vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānakarañāṇampi paññāya disvā ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
atk-s0305a0:728_17: tasmā dhammesu dhammānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:729_0: Evameva khoti ettha catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0305a0:729_1: Tasmiṃ paṃsupuñjo viya chasu āyatanesu kilesā.
atk-s0305a0:729_2: Catūhi disāhi āgacchantā sakaṭarathā viya catūsu ārammaṇesu pavattā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0305a0:729_3: Ekena sakaṭena vā rathena vā paṃsupuñjassa upahananaṃ viya kāyānupassanādīhi pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upaghāto veditabboti.
atk-s0305a0:733_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame evaṃ byākareyyāthāti kasmā attano vihārasamāpattiṃ ācikkhati?
atk-s0305a0:733_4: atha nesaṃ titthiyā “tumhe ‘asukasamāpattiyā nāma no satthā temāsaṃ vihāsī’tipi na jānātha,
atk-s0305a0:733_5: atha kasmā naṃ upaṭṭhahantā viharathā”ti upārambhaṃ āropeyyuṃ,
atk-s0305a0:734_5: Aññesañhi assāso vā pākaṭo hoti passāso vā,
atk-s0305a0:734_6: bhagavato ubhayampetaṃ pākaṭameva niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāyāti ekantasantattā na vutto.
atk-s0305a0:734_9: Satta hi sekhā sikkhitabbabhāvā sekhā nāma,
atk-s0305a0:734_11: tathāgatā asikkhitabbā asekkhā nāma natthi tesaṃ sikkhitabbakiccanti sikkhitabbābhāvā na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:736_3: Nirāmisāti nikkilesā kāyikacetasikadarathapaṭipassaddhiyā kāyopi cittampi passambhati.
atk-s0305a0:737_0: Evaṃ cuddasavidhena kāyapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno tasmiṃ kāye sati satisambojjhaṅgo,
atk-s0305a0:737_4: imesaṃ channaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ anosakkanaanativattanasaṅkhāto majjhattākāro upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
atk-s0305a0:737_5: Yatheva hi samappavattesu assesu sārathino “ayaṃ olīyatī”ti tudanaṃ vā,
atk-s0305a0:737_8: evameva imesaṃ channaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ anosakkanaanativattanasaṅkhāto majjhattākāro upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:738_1: Ettha pana soḷasakkhattukā ānāpānassati missakā kathitā,
atk-s0305a0:741_2: Catunnañhi mahādīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ anuggaṇhanto catunnañca apāyānaṃ appahīnabhāvaṃ garahanto satthā “kiñcāpi,
atk-s0305a0:741_5: Tattha catunnaṃ dīpānanti dvisahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:741_13: Piṇḍiyālopena hi yāpanaṃ anuggahanto catunnañca apāyānaṃ pahīnabhāvaṃ pasaṃsanto satthā “kiñcāpi,
atk-s0305a0:741_17: Terasahatthopi hi vatthasāṭako dasacchedanato paṭṭhāya nantakanteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0305a0:742_1: So panāyaṃ pasādo kiṃ eko, anekoti? Ekova,
atk-s0305a0:742_3: Yesu pana vatthūsu apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ruhati,
atk-s0305a0:742_4: tesaṃ vasena “buddhe aveccappasādenā”tiādinā nayena tidhā vutto.
atk-s0305a0:742_7: Ariyasāvakassa hi buddheyeva pasādo ca pemañca gāravañca mahantaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:742_12: na buddhe vā dhamme vāti etaṃ natthi.
atk-s0305a0:743_1: Pañca hi sīlāni bhavantaragatāpi ariyā na kopenti,
atk-s0305a0:743_9: evameva paṭipāṭiyā ādimhi vā ante vā bhinnaṃ sīlaṃ khaṇḍaṃ nāma,
atk-s0305a0:743_11: yattha katthaci dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā paṭipāṭiyā bhinnattā sabalaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:743_18: Samādhisaṃvattanikehīti appanāsamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ vā saṃvattetuṃ samatthehi.
atk-s0305a0:745_1: Dutiye yesaṃ saddhāti padena buddhe pasādo gahito.
atk-s0305a0:745_4: Dhammadassananti padena dhamme pasādo gahitoti evaṃ cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni vuttāni.
atk-s0305a0:745_6: Brahmacariyogadhaṃ sukhanti brahmacariyaṃ ogāhitvā ṭhitaṃ uparimaggattayasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:747_1: Tatiye tasmāti yasmā catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu sandissasi, tasmā.
atk-s0305a0:747_4: Evamassa upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0305a0:749_3: Buddhe aveccappasādādayo pana paṭiladdhaguṇā sotāpannassa aṅgā nāma,
atk-s0305a0:749_6: sappurise sevanto bhajanto payirupāsanto dhammaṃ suṇanto yoniso manasikaronto dhammānudhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0305a0:749_7: paṭipajjanto sotāpattiṃ paṭilabhatīti sappurisasaṃsevādayo sotāpattiatthāya aṅganti sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ nāma,
atk-s0305a0:751_1: Chaṭṭhe sādhuke paṭivasantīti sādhukanāmake attano bhogagāmake vasanti.
atk-s0305a0:751_4: Magge purisaṃ ṭhapesunti tesaṃ kira gāmadvārena bhagavato gamanamaggo.
atk-s0305a0:751_5: Tasmā “bhagavā kāle vā akāle vā amhākaṃ suttānaṃ vā pamattānaṃ vā gaccheyya,
atk-s0305a0:751_6: atha passituṃ na labheyyāmā”ti maggamajjhe purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0305a0:752_0: Anubandhiṃsūti na dūratova piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhiṃsu,
atk-s0305a0:752_1: bhagavā pana sakaṭamaggassa majjhe jaṅghamaggena agamāsi,
atk-s0305a0:752_3: Maggā okkammāti buddhānañhi kenaci saddhiṃ gacchantānaṃyeva paṭisanthāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati kenaci saddhiṃ ṭhitakānaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:752_6: “imehi me saddhiṃ gacchantassa paṭisanthāraṃ kātuṃ ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:752_8: ime hi mayhaṃ sāsane sāmino āgataphalā.
atk-s0305a0:752_9: Imehi saddhiṃ nisīditvāva divasabhāgaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmī”ti maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0305a0:753_0: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti te kira chattupāhanaṃ kattaradaṇḍaṃ pādabbhañjanatelādīni ceva aṭṭhavidhañca
atk-s0305a0:753_4: Ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsūti sesāni chattupāhanādīni bhikkhusaṅghassa dethāti vatvā sayampi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:754_0: Sāvatthiyā kosalesu cārikaṃ pakkamissatītiādi sabbaṃ majjhimapadesavasenava vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0305a0:754_4: majjhimadese aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetīti niyatattā majjhimadesavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:754_5: Āsanne no bhagavā bhavissatīti ettha na kevalaṃ āsannattāyeva tesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a0:754_6: atha kho “idāni dānaṃ dātuṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ kātuṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ labhissāmā”ti tesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:755_0: Tasmātiha thapatayo sambādho gharāvāsoti thapatayo yasmā tumhākaṃ mayi dūrībhūte anappakaṃ domanassaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:755_3: Gharāvāsassa hi dosena tumhākaṃ evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:755_5: atha evaṃ vo mayā saddhiṃyeva gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca taṃ na bhaveyyāti imamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha.
atk-s0305a0:755_7: Mahāvāse vasantassapi hi sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova.
atk-s0305a0:755_10: Abbhokāso pabbajjāti pabbajjā pana akiñcanaapalibodhaṭṭhena abbhokāso.
atk-s0305a0:755_11: Caturatanikepi hi gabbhe dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭetvā nisinnānampi akiñcanaapalibodhaṭṭhena pabbajjā abbhokāso nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a0:755_12: Alañca pana vo thapatayo appamādāyāti evaṃ sambādhe gharāvāse vasantānaṃ tumhākaṃ appamādameva kātuṃ yuttanti attho.
atk-s0305a0:756_0: Ekaṃ purato ekaṃ pacchato nisīdāpemāti te kira dvepi janā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitesu dvīsu nāgesu tā itthiyo
atk-s0305a0:756_1: evaṃ nisīdāpetvā rañño nāgaṃ majjhe katvā ubhosu passesu gacchanti,
atk-s0305a0:756_3: Nāgopi rakkhitabboti yathā kiñci visevitaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0305a0:756_7: Attāpīti sitahasitakathitavipekkhitādīni akarontehi attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:756_8: (Tehi tathā karontehi na attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti).
atk-s0305a0:756_9: Tathā karonto hi “sāmidubbho eso”ti niggahetabbo hoti.
atk-s0305a0:756_10: Tasmātiha thapatayoti yasmā tumhe rājā niccaṃ rājabhaṇḍaṃ paṭicchāpeti,
atk-s0305a0:756_12: Yasmā pana paṃsukūlikabhikkhuṃ evaṃ paṭicchāpento natthi,
atk-s0305a0:756_14: Evaṃ sabbatthāpi alañca pana vo thapatayo appamādāya appamādameva karothāti dasseti.
atk-s0305a0:757_4: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dānena ceva appamattakampi kiñci laddhā tatopi saṃvibhāge rato.
atk-s0305a0:759_1: Sattame veḷudvāranti gāmadvāre paveṇiāgatassa veḷugacchassa atthitāya evaṃladdhanāmo gāmo.
atk-s0305a0:761_1: Aṭṭhame ñātiketi ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā,
atk-s0305a0:761_6: Oranti laddhanāmehi vā tīhi maggehi pahātabbānītipi orambhāgiyāni.
atk-s0305a0:761_7: Tattha kāmacchando byāpādoti imāni dve samāpattiyā vā avikkhambhitāni maggena vā asamucchinnāni nibbattivasena
atk-s0305a0:761_8: uddhaṃ bhāgaṃ rūpabhavaṃ arūpabhavaṃ vā gantuṃ na denti.
atk-s0305a0:761_9: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni tīṇi tattha nibbattampi ānetvā puna idheva nibbattāpentīti sabbānipi orambhāgiyāneva.
atk-s0305a0:762_0: Rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttāti ettha kadāci uppattiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya cāti dvedhāpi tanubhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a0:762_1: Sakadāgāmissa hi puthujjanānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ rāgādayo na uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:762_3: Uppajjamānā ca na puthujjanānaṃ viya bahalabahalā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a0:762_10: Taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sotāpannassa satta bhave ṭhapetvā aṭṭhame bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi,
atk-s0305a0:762_11: sakadāgāmissa dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu bhavatanukaṃ natthi,
atk-s0305a0:762_12: anāgāmissa rūpārūpabhavaṃ ṭhapetvā kāmabhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi,
atk-s0305a0:762_13: khīṇāsavassa kismiñci bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthī”ti vuttattā paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a0:763_0: Imaṃ lokanti imaṃ kāmāvacaralokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:763_2: sace hi manussesu sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patto devesu nibbattitvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0305a0:763_4: Asakkonto pana avassaṃ manussalokaṃ āgantvā sacchikaroti.
atk-s0305a0:763_5: Devesu sakadāgāmiphalaṃ pattopi sace manussesu nibbattitvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0305a0:763_7: Asakkonto pana avassaṃ devalokaṃ gantvā sacchikarotīti.
atk-s0305a0:764_4: Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ assa gati paṭisaraṇaṃ avassaṃ pattabbāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0305a0:764_5: Vihesāvesāti tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇagatiṃ ñāṇūpapattiṃ ñāṇābhisamparāyaṃ olokentassa kāyakilamathova esa, ānanda,
atk-s0305a0:765_3: Nirayādayo hi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātato ayato apetattā apāyo,
atk-s0305a0:767_4: So kira gāmo kiñcāpi nātimahā ahosi,
atk-s0305a0:767_6: Tattha tattha ahivātarogena ekappahāreneva catuvīsati pāṇasatasahassāni kālamakaṃsu,
atk-s0305a0:771_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame rājakārāmeti raññā kāritattā evaṃ laddhanāme ārāme,
atk-s0305a0:771_3: Paṭhamabodhiyaṃ kira lābhaggayasaggapattaṃ satthāraṃ disvā titthiyā cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0305a0:771_5: na kho panesa aññaṃ kiñci sīlaṃ vā samādhiṃ vā nissāya evaṃ lābhaggayasaggapatto.
atk-s0305a0:771_7: sace mayampi jetavanasamīpe ārāmaṃ kārāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyāma,
atk-s0305a0:771_9: Te attano attano upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā satasahassamatte kahāpaṇe labhitvā te ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:771_12: sace samaṇo gotamo vā samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā vā āgantvā vāressanti,
atk-s0305a0:772_4: Satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma pamukhe ṭhatvā “ke pana te, ānanda,
atk-s0305a0:772_5: uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?, Pucchi. Titthiyā, bhante,
atk-s0305a0:772_7: ime sāsanena paṭiviruddhā bhikkhusaṅghassa aphāsuvihāraṃ karissanti,
atk-s0305a0:773_0: Thero bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:773_10: “attano rajje ṭhatvā kālaṃ kātuṃ na labhissatī”ti.
atk-s0305a0:774_0: Dutiyadivase ca sāmaṃyeva bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a0:774_6: tāva satthu santike nisīdissāmī”ti āgantvā nisinnaṃ rājānaṃ “tayā, mahārāja,
atk-s0305a0:774_8: “kāraṇeneva naṃ saññāpessāmī”ti idaṃ atītakāraṇaṃ āhari – mahārāja,
atk-s0305a0:774_9: pabbajite nāma aññamaññaṃ yujjhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a0:774_10: Atītepi isayo aññamaññaṃ yujjhāpetvā saha raṭṭhena rājā samuddaṃ paviṭṭhoti.
atk-s0305a0:775_2: Pañcasatā pañcasatā dve isigaṇā pabbatapādato loṇambilasevanatthāya bharunagaraṃ gantvā nagarassa avidūre dve rukkhā atthi,
atk-s0305a0:775_3: paṭhamaṃ āgato isigaṇo ekassa rukkhassa mūle nisīdi,
atk-s0305a0:775_5: Te yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā pabbatapādaṃ eva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:775_6: Te puna āgacchantāpi attano rukkhamūleyeva nisīdanti.
atk-s0305a0:775_8: tasmiṃ sukkhe āgatā tāpasā “ayaṃ rukkho mahā,
atk-s0305a0:775_9: amhākampi tesampi pahossatī”ti itaresaṃ rukkhamūlassa ekapadese nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:775_10: Te pacchā āgacchantā rukkhamūlaṃ apavisitvā bahi ṭhitāva “kasmā tumhe ettha nisīdathā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:775_16: nikkhamatha tumhe”ti kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “na tumhe attanova manena nikkhamissathā”ti hatthādīsu gahetvā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:775_17: Te “hotu sikkhāpessāma ne”ti iddhiyā sovaṇṇamayāni dve cakkāni rajatamayañca akkhaṃ māpetvā pavaṭṭentā rājadvāraṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:775_20: Rājā tuṭṭho “pakkosathā”ti te pakkosāpetvā “mahākammaṃ tumhehi kataṃ,
atk-s0305a0:775_21: atthi vo kiñci mayā kattabba”nti āha. Āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0305a0:776_0: Te bahi ṭhitā “kiṃ nu kho datvā labhiṃsū”ti olokayamānā “idaṃ nāmā”ti disvā “mayampi lañjaṃ datvā puna
atk-s0305a0:776_1: gaṇhissāmā”ti iddhiyā sovaṇṇamayaṃ rathapañjaraṃ māpetvā ādāya agamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:776_4: Mahārāja amhākaṃ rukkhamūle añño isigaṇo nisinno,
atk-s0305a0:776_8: “ananucchavikaṃ amhehi kata”nti vippaṭisārino hutvā pabbatapādameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a0:776_9: Tato devatā “ayaṃ rājā dvinnaṃ isigaṇānaṃ hatthato lañjaṃ gahetvā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kārāpesī”ti kujjhitvā
atk-s0305a0:776_10: mahāsamuddaṃ ubbaṭṭetvā tassa rañño vijitaṃ yojanasahassamattaṭṭhānaṃ samuddameva akaṃsūti.
atk-s0305a0:778_0: Ucchinno saha raṭṭhehi, sa rājā vibhavaṅgato”ti. –
atk-s0305a0:779_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā imasmiṃ atīte dassite yasmā buddhānaṃ nāma kathā okappaniyā hoti,
atk-s0305a0:779_1: “tasmā rājā attano kiriyaṃ sallakkhetvā anupadhāretvā mayā akattabbaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti “gacchatha, bhaṇe,

atk-s0305a0:924_0: 1140. Kule jeṭṭhāpacāyinoti kule jeṭṭhānaṃ apacāyino, nīcavuttinoti attho.
atk-s0305a0:927_5: bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā,
atk-s0305a0:931_6: gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyantā vibhūsenti nāma.
atk-s0305a0:931_8: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-s0305a0:934_1: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:934_2: Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ
atk-s0305a0:934_4: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ,
atk-s0305a0:936_0: 1152. Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayanaṃ akappiyattharaṇaṃ, tato paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0305a0:940_1: Āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇāti sāli- vīhi- yava- godhuma- kaṅgu- varaka-
atk-s0305a0:942_1: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra uddissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0305a0:946_1: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0305a0:946_3: ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a0:949_2: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0305a0:951_3: gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:951_4: Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:953_6: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0305a0:953_8: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0305a0:953_10: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0305a0:953_12: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-s0305a0:954_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti.
atk-s0305a0:954_7: tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
atk-s0305a0:955_4: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0305a0:955_5: dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0305a0:955_7: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0305a0:955_10: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantaṃ mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0305a0:957_1: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:957_2: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0305a0:957_4: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati.
atk-s0305a0:957_9: migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā,
atk-s0305a0:957_10: migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto “na me, bho,
atk-s0305a0:957_13: Tena hi dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. Nanu, bho,
atk-s0305a0:957_18: ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti.
atk-s0305a0:957_19: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0305a0:958_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti amaṇiṃ maṇinti,
atk-s0305a0:958_4: Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogā vañcanasāciyogā nikatisāciyogāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a0:958_5: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti.
atk-s0305a0:960_6: Yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggapaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-s0305a0:979_0: Yaṃ puññamupacitaṃ tena hotu sabbo sukhī loko.
atk-s0305a0:983_0: Yaṃ samadhigataṃ puññaṃ tenāpi jano sukhī bhavatū”ti.
atk-s0305a0:984_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-s0305a0:984_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ sāratthappakāsinī nāma saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathā.
